name: Trisha Dean
text: Sat in the waiting room for an hour then was moved to a tiny hallway for another 30 this is my Dr office and it sucks whole experience was terrible

name: Tina Peden
text: Great

name: Janet Jones
text: Prompt, friendly, full-service care

name: Jerry Boykin
text: Awesome

name: Brittney Mobley
text: Horrible location honestly. The definition of Doc in a box. This place will take your money and throw a wild guess at your situation. Literally came up w bs both times. It just didn’t sit well with me.  If you are in need of real care please choose another location. I was unknowingly suffering from a real life or death emergency. Had either doctor taken the time to actual see me they would’ve know to advise additional care ESPECIALLY after my second visit. What a joke! They prescribed me Mucinex lol . Do yourself a favorite and go to a real doctor. The only consistent part is the ladies up from who are processing your PAYMENTS and the triage. I was billed $400 for 10 minutes and something I could’ve googled. T E R R I B L E!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We sincerely apologize about the issues you experienced, and we hope to make this right. Please reach out to patientadvocate@americanfamilycare.com so we can rectify this issue. Please include your full name, DOB, and a brief detail of your experience.

name: Tymecca Lee
text: This is the worst urgent care ever. I saw nurse at 3:26. She told me to wait 15 mins and its now 4:25 and i am just leaving, after i had to leave room and go upfront and remind them i was still waiting. Completely useless...i need corporate or district number so i can let them know the conversations i also heard from the employess while i sat and waited.

name: Ryan Church
text: I had to get a COVID test back in September for a job site I was working on. My insurance company covers the test and the AFC website states that all insured patients pay no out of pocket cost for rapid test. January 4th $175 came out of my account for the test I received. I was then billed an additional $360 for the same test. I have made countless effort to get this resolved as well as my wife. This location refers us to corporate each time where we are then sent to voicemail with no call back. Our insurance company has even tried to contact to get the same outcome as us. We have even emailed and still no response! I am not paying a total of $535 for what is suppose to be a FREE test!!

resp.text: We would like the chance to turn your experience around. If you are willing to give us another chance, please reach out to us at  American Family Care - McCalla(205) 461-0038 to speak to our manager directly

name: k Harris
text: Incompetent sign in clerk. I called to ask if they do covid lab test. The receptionist says yes. I then ask if the have a long wait. She says no. I immediately drive 2 minutes up the street and the parking lot and lobby are packed. Once I get to the front to sign in, I'm told they are not doing anymore tests today. She then states they have time slots that fill up within the first hour of operation.  She should have stated this when I called. This is also a contradiction of their website which states no appointments required. A  required time slot is an appointment!!

text:
Called AFC at 8 anout getting covid test and was told we needed to get here early that there was already a line. We arrived at 8:30. Had to sign up for the 9:20 time slot. Came back in at 9:20 and had to fill out paperwork which took 30 minutes. Then we waited in waiting area, as more and more people came in, for another 35 minutes before they called us back.

However, once we got back, we were tested quickly and the nurse practitioner was very thorough.

But it took 1 hour to find out I tested negative but that they dropped my husbands test. So he had to be retested. They will call us with those results.

Now I see when lady calls patient names, she just keeps calling until someone walks up from inside, no one is being called thats in their car..  I do not recommend...

There is no way that it should ever humanly necessary to spend SIX AND A HALF HOURS at ANY urgent care or doctors office for a Covid rapid test and blood work. It took FIVE, yes, FIVE attempts in 4 different spots among 3 staff to finally get blood. I was forgotten about for the first 2 hours of this visit and I know I was forgotten about. I was told to wait in my car and I would receive a phone call. I eventually called back and, the lady who answered, her reaction clearly said yes, we forgot about you.

Very unprofessional, very poorly trained, borderline mal-practice.

I left in pain, in tears and very unhappy with the staff at this location. Not how anyone should leave the doctor when sick.

text: This used to be a good place to go.  I came here with a sinus infection and the female doctor gave me amoxicillin which did nothing. After 35 minutes I managed to get someone's attention who then got the lady that works at the desk.  She said she thought I was waiting on someone despite having watched me sign in.  I thought ok they will call me back soon.  Nope.  They literally called everyone else first.  Now I did nothing rude or untoward to cause anyone to have a grudge against me so I have no explanation for that behavior. 30 minutes later I am sitting in the exam room waiting for a staff person before the doctor will see me.  No explanation of why.  Do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.  I would have left but I'm too sick and have too much time invested for this trip.

name: Tyra Hoggle
text:
We were staying in the area for the Thanksgiving holiday. My granddaughter had fever, sore throat and body aches.  I had severe headache and body aches as well. I had looked up and noticed AFC was open at 8am and was very thankful. (We arrived around 8:30) Only 2 cars in the parking lot at the time.  As we were signing in,  one person came out that had been seen by the NP that was on call.  I was finally taken back to be triaged and put in a room.  My daughter and granddaughter were still in waiting room for another 10 mins or so before they were taken back to be triaged and put into a room.

Once in a room, I waited for a little while and the NP came in and saw me.  She was great! She told me someone would be in to swab me for the flu and strep. Head hurting, lying on the bed...all I heard was talking and laughing coming from the nurses station.  Waited for what seemed like forever...still no one shows up to check on me.  I go to the restroom across the hall from my room and came back out to the nurses sitting at the station talking about Thanksgiving, shopping, etc. I then asked if my orders to be swabbed had been sent to them.  They all opened their laptops and said oh yes, here it is. "Someone will be with you in a moment".  Then a moment of silence from them and then the chattering back and forth began again.

A couple of minutes later the nurse that came in was Kia, very sweet and kind.  I had not met or even saw her until she came into do the swab. She did apologize for the delay and said that she had previously been in with another patient. I laid my head back down and then texted by daughter a few minutes later and asked her if my granddaughter had been swabbed as well.  She said she had not been.  I then went back outside my door and asked if anyone had been in to swab by granddaughter and was told yes...without even giving them her name at first. My daughter heard them bold face lie to me.  I told them that I knew that no one had been in there to swab her and expected it to be done ASAP because she was very sick. A "professional" to lie to my face is repulsive.

Again Kia, was the nurse sent into the room to do the swab.  After the test came back on me, a totally different nurse came into the room and gave me my shots.  I never saw one of the ones sitting at the desk again.  That is where they stayed.  My granddaughter finally received her diagnosis as strep and was also given a shot.  The shot was given by Kia.

Where were all the other nurses that had nothing to do but sit around the desk and chit chat all morning?  For us being the only patients there during all of this time, it should not have taken 2 hours. I don't mind waiting at all if there is a good reason but this particular day and location, there was no reason for this to be a 2 hour visit.  This is what will happen you have a full staff on hand but only a couple of them are actually working.

resp.text: Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 461-0038. We look forward to hearing from you.

I saw someone else and asked them and she rudely stated that she was the only doctor and had no idea. After waiting another 15 minutes, I finally left and asked for a refund.  It wasn't until then that they finally said they could help me. I was definitely offended at this point. It shouldn't take me asking for a refund to get help. I will never go to this place again because they obviously don't value people's time and patience. I would rate a negative, if that option was available.

name: Josh Gaddis
text: It would be really nice if doctors would actually believe you when you tell them you're in unbearable pain and actually try to help you. I wish I knew the solution, but our health care system is broken here and needs major fixes.

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. It's experiences like yours that really keep us motivated! If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help

name: Takira Petty
text: Everyone was friendly and professional.   Dr. Acknew was very informative, attentive and considerate.

resp.text: Our teams strive to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out!

name: Joseph Jackson
text: Needs better seevice. Need better doctors. They must have a high turn over rate because I never see the same doctors. This particular one really sucks a$$!!

name: rain kennedy
text: Went in with a sprained ankle, the doctor was very knowledgeable and personable, and obviously cared about my health. He took the time to be very thorough in his physical examination and explanation of my treatment plan. The entire staff was very professional but welcoming. The facility is pristine, and I was in and out in less than an hour.

resp.text: Rain, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to American Family Care - Bessemer! If you have any further questions, please give us a call. We're always happy to help!

name: debra burns
text: My regular Dr was not in as usual & I was sick & just walked in & didn't have to wait. The staff was wonderful and the Dr took time to explain what was wrong & tell me how to take the medicine he prescribed & what it was for. And that's rare these day. I'll definitely go back when I need a Dr

resp.text: Hi Debra, thank you so much for your positive comments about American Family Care - Bessemer! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

name: Legertha Riddle
text: You all were fast and he did a good job providing me with the care I needed.  Thank you so much

name: Duwana.L.B Robinson
text: My experience at AFC was a very pleasant one, despite the fact that I was sick. My nurse Sherry gets major points for easing my nerves before my treatments. I highly recommend this AFC center. Thanks Sherry, you're great.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Ron Jones
text: Very friendly, professional and knowledgeable staff. Dr. Morgan was very thorough in diagnosising my ailment. She prescribed the appropriate medication. The facility was clean and comfortable. I was in and out in less than an hour. I would highly recommend this urgent care center!

resp.text: Ron, thank you so much for the positive review! Thanks again for the recommendation, and have an amazing day!

name: Myeshia Ware
text: Extravagant service. I felt horrible went I arrived and the staff was very kind. Dr Powell was very knowledgeable, understanding, and very thorough he explained everything in detail. The best visit at AFC if ever sick again I will be back in and out quick and pleasant service. I really appreciate it...

resp.text: Myeshia, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to American Family Care - Bessemer! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Carley Mc
text: This was honestly the best experience I've ever had at an AFC. Everyone I spoke to was so polite, kind, and upbeat. You've done a great job not only with the facility but also with selecting your staff at this location.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! Our teams strive to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out. We can't wait to see you again, have a great day!

name: S M
text: I gave them a great review on Saturday n the medicine made me sick and I called back today to see if they could call me something else in but they told me I had to come in and pay another copay to get another medication  I told them this was not right but said it was their policy  What do u think? Is that right? I am still as sick as I was on Saturday with a terrible headache from coughing!

name: Jay Pinkney
text: The staff was very accommodating and tended to my needs in a timely and professional manner.

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. It's experiences like yours that really keep us motivated! If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help

name: Adrianne Anderson
text: My experience at AFC was great!  The doctor and staff ensure that I felt comfortable during the visit.  I left reassured knowing that I was placed on the right prescription and regiment for my injury.  I was appreciative for the follow up call and in knowing that there's competent health care personnel near who care about patients in and around the Bessemer/Mccalla area.  Thanks for everything!

resp.text: Hi Adrianne, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Bessemer. We're happy we could meet your expectations!

name: Kristina Hocutt
text: All of the staff were very friendly and professional. And Dr Powell and his scribe, Angela, we're wonderful, as always. I would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Hi Kristina Hocutt, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! We look forward to your next visit! Take care!

name: Mia R.
text: Thanks so much for everything! The staff were so sweet and pleasant to talk to. Everything was handled quickly and American Family Care was the best experience I've ever had with a clinic or doctor!

name: Kevin Lee
text: Out of the past 3 visits I've had the shortest one has been 2 hours. I sign in and have the two people that signed in after me seen first then I go ask when I'll be seen and she hadn't even put my info in. Then the wait in the exam room is beyond reasonable. Don't come here unless you have all day to spend here.

resp.text: Kevin Lee, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. We regret that you had a negative experience, and will use this as an opportunity to improve.

name: Portia Jennings
text: Don’t visit this AFC. The nurse that took my stats was nice and friendly but the doctor was not thorough. Just immediately suggested a shot. When I told him I didn’t want to do that he never even came back in. He sent another lady in to give me discharge instructions where the doctor put that he discussed all of these things with me—which he did NOT. It’s a waste of time going here.

name: Ken Snider
text: I want to American Family Care off of Eastern Valley Road yesterday and it was great I wish I had met Dr Morgan years ago. She was easy to talk to and to the point. The receptionist the nurse even the vampire who drew the blood easy with the noodles and I can appreciate that. I didn't have time to fill out the forms before they call me in to the back

resp.text: Hello Ken Snider, thank you; we appreciate your feedback!

name: Melinda Jacobs
text: My husband and I went there because they advertise that they do Family Practice. I have a condition that does not allow me to drive and he works 6 days a week with very long hours. Weekends are the only time we have to go. We were open with them about this. Our old primary care physician is too far away now that we have moved. We were treated like drug addicts because we both take some strong medicine which we never asked them to fill. Them called in medicine that was wrong. The amount of insulin they called in for me to take would have killed me. Thank goodness the pharmacist caught it, however it took 3 days to get the doctor to fix it. So I went 3 days without insilin. Then he didn't call in the needles for the insulin pens. I called for those and they called in syringes instead of pen needles like I asked for. So again another night without insulin. When they finally got it right I was told to find a primary care doctor to handle all the issues I have. They are supposed to be my primary care doctor now. The issues I have are that they can't get anything right with my prescriptions. I'm not the problem here. It scares me how bad they don't listen and transfer information and then want to blame the patient.

resp.text: Melinda, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. We appreciate you bringing this experience to our attention. If you are willing, please contact us at (205) 461-0038 so we can work towards a resolution. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Denese Mason
text: The staff was friendly.  I arrived around 515 pm on Saturday and they closed at 6pm.  However, I felt welcomed and important.  I was seen fairly quickly and did not feel hurried or rushed.  The nurse and doctor were very nice and made me feel comfortable.  I will be returning to this clinic if the need arises.  Satisfied patient!

resp.text: Hi Denese Mason, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Bessemer. We're happy we could meet your expectations!

name: Latrice Cleveland
text: I went there sick and left even sicker. The doctor prescribed me an antibiotic that gave me really bad flu like symptoms. I came back there 2 days later and he then prescribed some Tamiflu. I didnt take it. I was so sick that I eventually went to the ER. They told me that I shouldn't have been given antibiotics for my condition in the first place. So now I'm suffering until the effects of the medication wear off. I'm still feeling sick a week later. 😞

resp.text: It's upsetting to hear that your experience was anything but stellar. We would like to work towards a resolution, so if you are willing, please reach out to us at  (205) 461-0038 to discuss this further.

name: B Reach
text: Always fast paced in & out, friendly staff. Dr. Powell took a lot time explaining ways help me get better, his attention towards me by far best, most doctors write meds & out the door not him. Soon as I entered building all of weekend staff was very nice, courteous to me, I'll definitely be a returning customer.

resp.text: Hi B Reach! We're so happy we were able to help you out! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Susan Vice
text: Would have given 5 *, but the wait time was a little on the excessive side, once we got in a rm.  We thought we'd been forgotten about, & my husband had to pop his head out to ck.  There was only 1 other person in waiting rm. when we went to get vitals, & maybe 5 cars in the parking lot (inc. ours).  However, it was a Sun. morning, & I think there was only one Dr. there, so all in all, we were treated well.  I would recommend them, esp. as an after-hrs. clinic, & much better than an ER wait!

resp.text: Hi Susan, we are very happy to have provided you with such a positive experience! We hope to be of service to you again in the future.  Best wishes,  American Family Care - Bessemer

name: Shakina Young
text: Dr. Akhtar was excellent! The fact he was able to solve my issue without meds is just awesome!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Juanita MItchell-Davis
text: Everyone was professional & nice. I would definitely visit again

name: Jhan Powers
text: Very short wait. Very thorough evaluation by the doctor. I felt better the next day. I was in and out in about an hour. The office called and checked in me the day after I was seen there, which I thought was nice.

resp.text: Jhan , we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations! Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Kathy Cozza
text: 1 staff member out of 5 I encountered was actually polite. Two hours wasted and no results. Will never go to this location again.

name: Karlie Fields
text: Great experience! Chose to go to this location because I woke up Sunday morning feeling horrible. Glad I did!! The wait was very minimal & I was in/out very fast, but the exam & staff were very thorough. Will recommended this location to all family & friends!!

resp.text: Karlie Fields, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations!

name: Larry Futrell
text: Very friendly staff, short wait time, and Dr. Larry Taylor was thorough. He diagnosed the problem, prescribed the appropriate meds and he encouraged me to touch back base in a couple of days to see if my symptoms had worsened or improved in case he needed to recommend further treatment.

resp.text: Hi Larry, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Bessemer. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Adrienne Moffett Powell
text: Nurse was unfriendly and I was there for 2 hours. I waited in the exam room for an hour and I never saw the doctor. Eventually, I had to just leave the room and request a refund of my co pay. I was only there for a lingering cold. This was my first time at this particular location and my last.

resp.text: Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (205) 461-0038. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: david knight
text: staff was courteous and professional,  Dr Powell was very thorough and knowledgeable,  very impressed, one of the  best experiences with a physician ever, so glad I chose this place

name: Rebecca McCoy
text: The service was ok as far as urgent care goes, but good luck with the billing department. We have been there multiple times, and they send you the same bill twice even after you pay it. When you call the customer service to tell them you already paid it, all the agents are busy, and you'll be on hold for ever, and that is if you are lucky enough to get anyone to answer.

resp.text: Hi, Rebecca Mccoy, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. Our manager would really like to help turn your experience around. If you would be willing to give us another chance, please contact our manager at (205) 461-0038 to discuss what we can do to help.

name: CANDACE L KELLY
text: They were very fast! All the nurses were friendly and the clinic was so clean! I'd recommend everyone to come here.

resp.text: Candace, thank you for the high star rating!

name: Joey Hubbard
text: I was very pleased with the professionalism and friendliness of the staff and physician. They all did an excellent job. I felt well taken care of.

resp.text: Joey Hubbard, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations!

name: rita roose
text: Been waiting for 2 hours and still havn't seen a doctor or nurse practitioner

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback about your experience with us. We would like to have a better understanding about your experience. Please reach out to us at (205) 461-0038 at your earliest convenience and we will do our best to resolve this with you.

name: janice simmons
text: The people there were very nice to me, a the wait was minimal.  Sherry was the nicest and most considerate person, she took extremely good care of me while I was there, I hope she is there if I need to visit again.

resp.text: Janice Simmons, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations!

name: Kali Verzone
text: Dr. Powell is wonderful. Very thorough and caring. The staff has always been nice and caring as well

resp.text: Hi Kali, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Bessemer. We're happy we could meet your expectations! If you're ever in need of more help, please let us know!

name: Geneva Marchek
text: I was kind of worried about coming here because of some reviews where people said they waited forever. I came at 9 in the morning and there were three people ahead of me. I got seen in about twenty minutes. The staff was kind and friendly and took good care off me when I got faint from my fever. I'll definitely be coming here in the future. My advice is just to try to come in the morning before lunch time if you can. If not, you might have a wait.

resp.text: Hi Captain Gen, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Bessemer. We're happy we could meet your expectations!

name: Jon Smotherman
text: Really appreciate the health fair #Bessemer

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review!

name: Angela Cotner
text: We were seen pretty quickly, the doctor as well as the nurse were very professional and informational!

resp.text: Angela Cotner, we strive for 100% satisfaction, and it is great to see you had such a positive experience at American Family Care - Bessemer. We hope to be of service to you again in the future.  Best wishes,  American Family Care - Bessemer

name: paula dixon
text: This American Family Care  showed caring and kindness to me when I visited. Everyone of the staff was pleasant and there was not a long wait time.

resp.text: Hi Paula, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Bessemer. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Until the next time we meet, take care!

text: Literally won’t ever come back here again! Paid a $30 copay just for the doctor to tell me “well it’s not an infection but I called your medicine in to the pharmacy”. I was debating on coming here or middle creek. I regret coming here.

resp.text: Hi Jamette, we appreciate your honest feedback, as we are always looking for ways to improve. text: I went to AFC on 4/17/17, Easter Sunday for a fall injury. I was seen quickly, before I had my paperwork done I was seen and set up for x-rays. Dr. Powell and all the staff seemed to really care

name: Jody Townes
text: Everyone was great and very professional and they had a great smile great place I would recommend anyone.😁😁😁😁😉

resp.text: Jody, we are glad we could help! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: K D
text: My son and I were there for over 3 hours. When we signed in and were called back..there was ONE other patient. The doctor ran several unnecessary tests and spent little to no time in the room discussing anything with me. I would not recommend this place or EVER go back.

resp.text: We appreciate all reviews, and appreciate you giving us the chance to improve by providing us with this feedback. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Donna Krehbiel
text: The entire staff was courteous and attentive to my needs.

resp.text: Donna Krehbiel, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at American Family Care - Bessemer! We can't wait to see you again, have a great day.

name: Frank Hawthorne
text: Fast and friendly customer service clean facilities great staff and highly experienced doctors with good bedside manners

resp.text: Frank, your wonderful feedback and rating mean a lot to us. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you; we are more than happy to help!

name: Maurice Ducker
text: They really took care of me when I had type b flu

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!

name: Sherry Teresa Chaney
text: I was treated like family. Everyone was so kind and patient. The doctor took lots of time with me. He explained my health issue and everything about the medications i would be taking. The nurses and staff were very kind and went out of their way to make sure I and my daughter that brought me in , were comfortable and had all we needed. The x-ray lady was so helpful. She even made me smile thru my pain. Everyone made me wish I could go there forever. Thank you. If you want to be treated like family and feel like they really care about you, not like cattle being pushed thru. Then this is the place to go.

name: Angela Mason
text: They were very professional and awesome to boot . Especially the nurse practitioner who waited on me. Give her two thumbs up

resp.text: Angela, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to American Family Care - Bessemer! If you have any further questions, please give us a call. We're always happy to help!

name: Reeves Burruss
text: Went here twice in 2 weeks out of convenience. Dr. assured me he knew what the problem was. After a second opinion he was absolutely wrong. 200$ out of pocket per visit? I had bcbs.. unless you have 100 % coverage insurance you might as well go to the er and find someone who knows what they are talking about. Absolutely not worth it. If you need anything besides antibiotics I would highly recommend going some place else. Also, waited 1 hr first visit, 2 hrs second visit before I ever saw a dr.

resp.text: Reeves, we're disappointed to hear of the negative experience you had at our location. We would like the opportunity to find out how we can better assist you in the future. If you are willing, please contact us (205) 461-0038.

name: David Collum
text: Very good professional little to no waiting time

resp.text: David Collum, we are glad we could help! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Vicki Watson
text: The staff at this afc is so kind and patient the young man that assisted me was awesome. Mrs Sherry in exray was great she made me feel relaxed and took good care of me. Dr. Pinch am-Benton is the best ever she is such a encouraging person I appreciate what they all did for me to feel better. Thank You All and May God Bless you😇😇😇

name: Ariel Wagner
text: I have never been so displeased with a business in my entire life period. I arrived at 2. It is now 5:30 and I have yet to see the Doctor. My girlfriend has taken a 3 hour nap in the exam room without disturbance. I am here for an X-ray for my hand. That's it. It takes less than 10 seconds to say the phrase "it's broke"/"it's not broke". I have gone to the extent to open my exam room door to ensure the doctor understands there are living people still in this room that have been waiting for 3 hours and it just so happens the business closes in 30 minutes. I will never step foot in this business again.

resp.text: Greetings. We appreciate your feedback. We welcome the opportunity to address all concerns. I am the patient advocate, and I can be reached at (205) 403-8902.. Thank you for allowing us to learn from you. Stay well.

name: Jeremy Bahnsen
text:
Never seen such a bait and switch set up. They make you think you're getting in quick and then you spend well over an hour in the exam room before seeing the doctor (we still haven't seen him yet). I guess that way the waiting room looks empty and people will stay. And it doesn't matters that it is a holiday. I've never waited so long in the exam room waiting to see the doctor.
UPDATE: we've now seen the doctor and he is very thorough. My wife was very pleasedifficult with him. Just need to do a better job warning patients how long it might be when the place looks empty.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback as well as your update. I am very grateful I was able to speak to you before leaving the clinic. I will use your feedback to make sure we do a better job in communication with our patients.  Again I truly apologize about your wait time. I hope that your wife feels better and may you be blessed with a wonderful new year.

name: casie franklin
text:
This place is a joke. Do not waist your time and money, but  seriously they lack in knowledge and experience!
.
They misdiagnosed my shingles with contact dermatitis..... and said my other symptoms of the shingles was due to a sinus infection.... sent me home with steroid shot, an itching med., steroid pack, and antibiotic.

They drew blood and said that my WBC was on the rise ( like they had been charting it over time), instead of saying my white blood count was elevated. Anyway she said that was from my sinus infection.
The shingles will also make your WBC go up.

On another occasion, my husband fell late in the evening and not sure why he stopped into AFC, but they sent him  home and told him that there was nothing wrong with it.  Long story short he still has problems with that shoulder. He ended up tearing a muscle.

Needless to say, I will never go back to AFC Bessemer/McCalla location.
Trust me go to the next red light and  take a left and go to Middle Creek Medical Center. I’ve never had a bad experience, or peronally heard of a bad review from them. My whole family has went to them and the ONLY reason I stopped into AFC this time was because I drove to Middle Creek and they had closed early this day. And I was feeling so bad. I should have went home because I knew better! That’s why I went and got a second opionion because I knew it wasn’t contact dermatitis!!!!!!! ( from personal experience plus I work in health care).

I never got seen by a MD. Only a Nurse Practioner.

resp.text: We appreciate all reviews, and appreciate you giving us the chance to improve by providing us with this feedback. Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we can improve. We hope you will consider us again in the future. Take care.

name: Jeff Lewis
text: Staff was great. Best experience I've had at a doctor's office in a long time, even better than my regular primary care doctor.

name: Simone English
text: I visited with Dr. Harden on July 12, 2018 at American Family Care Bessemer, AL at approximately 5:30pm. Over the course of my visit with this MD in regards to my foot pain, he was very rude and harassed me about my weight. Upon entering the exam room, MD  requested that my daughter (2yrs old) turn off my personal cell phone without acknowledging me as the patient. Then he proceeds to insinuate that my foot pain is due to my weight. Also, he used  an analogy stating that my body weight was more like an “elephant and not a bull”;  therefore, I need to eat more vegetables and not high protein diets. Additionally, he not only harassed me about my weight but provided his personal opinion that I was "ruining my child” by allowing her to watch tv on my cellular device. Furthermore, he communicated that my child "must be a daycare baby” because she seeking attention from me while I was being examined. Lastly, he communicated that I should let him keep my daughter because he could "turn a 'F' child into a 'A' child." This MD’s words throughout my visit was harassment, derogatory and unacceptable.

name: Roz Dear Momma
text: The foreign doctor listened to me and researched other doctors notes before settling on my plan of care. She returned to tell me I was right! Urgent Care Doctors seldom care what the previous doctor treatment was. They follow their own treatment regimen.  She abliged me and did a more extensive lab. She confirmed sinusitis by elevated white blood cells. Although my urine appeared clean it was sent out for a culture. Funny, once I started antibiotics my 5-6 night trips to restroom decreased to 3 then 2. What a blessing to get some sleep again! I'm bad and do sip water through the night when I wake up thirsty. No more E.R. visits for non-emergencies. When ill who needs long waits and bandaid therapy, brushed off and told to make appt with your primary doctor. Urgent Care has faster triage, service in general and more likely to address EACH problem not just your MAJOR problem;-)

resp.text: Hi Roz, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at American Family Care - Bessemer. We're happy we could meet your expectations! We sincerely thank you for the positive review, and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Dandreka Atchinson
text: I have had the best experience in the McCalla clinic. the staff there is very helpful. Tiffany in the front office always greets you when you open the door and enter the building.She is very quick to get answers for any questions about my moms bill if I have any.  I always bring my mom there when she isnt feeling well and at 85 she doesnt like to go to the doctor but she will go to AFC because the staff always caters to her and makes her feel like she is at home. I always enjoy when the manager is there she is very caring as well.I always tell my family how well we are treated there at AFC. Keep up the good work !!!! Thank you AFC my mom loves you all

resp.text: Dandreka Atchinson, we're so glad that we were able to go above and beyond your expectations!

text: Passing thru Alabama, had to make a trip to American Family care at Bessemer. This place is sooooo awesome. Staff very helpful. Thank you for all your help. Got me back on road.

text: Dr. Andrews is an awesome doctor. He is very thorough, kind, and caring to his patients. I would definitely recommend to others.

name: Keysha Moody
text: The front desk receptionist Vanessa is absolutely the worst! Made an appointment back in March for April 21,2021 never received a reminder call because she recorded my phone number wrong!! When I finally realized I hadn't received my reminder. I called the office.I explained to Vanessa my situation  she then very nonchalantly confirmed my number and it was wrong. So I proceed to tell Her I needed to reschedule. She offers me the 18th with a nurse practioner and I asked is that a Thursday. I then proceeded to tell her my work schedule and reconfirm my corrected number she never responds or even acknowledge my comments. And then after silence for a few minutes she says my next availability is JULY!! I then say that's not my fault that you recorded the wrong number! And her response was YOU SHOULD REMEMBER YOUR APPOINTMENT!! Its a courtesy we call you!! How RUDE!! I WONDER if DR.ANDREWS KNOW WHATS REPRESENTING HIS PRACTICE!! I will take this BCBS somewhere its appreciated!!!

name: Natalie Francis
text: I'm always amazed at the care from intake to the end of my visit. The nurse makes you smile even in the face of COVID-19, not an easy time to be in healthcare. Thanks Dr. Andrews and your team.

name: Todd Aronson
text: Doctors are awesome. But whomever does prescriptions and call backs is atrocious. They won’t call you. Or respond to you. You have to make an appointment for anything that needs done. They’re all about copays and office visit charges. I’m so done with these people.

name: Sarah Capps
text: Great dr. Yes sometimes you gotta wait. While I wait I think to myself. I'm thankful it isn't me or my family that needed extra care today. I'm thankful my family is healthy. I'm thankful I see a doc who is willing to take extra time if that's what we needed.

name: James Dorsey
text: Dr Andrews is a very competent and understanding physician. His approach to medicine is holistic. His staff is very understanding and patient. He's very knowledgeable but still takes time to listen and consider my suggestions. He always treats my underlying cause and has never been quick to prescribe medicines that mask the issue at hand.

name: Sekeenia Snead
text: My son has been going to this Dr for years. He’s 13 now and we moved away for 5 years and came back and i still used him as my family physician. He’s a great guy but the hours of waiting has gotten so bad. His office is the only dr office that i have to wait so long to be seen. I basically can’t have anything planned for the rest of the day when one of us need to give him a visit. I have expressed my concerns and i feel like it’s dismissed.

name: April Fortune
text: I have been going to Dr. Andrews now for approximately 10 years (give or take a few) and I will not go anywhere else.  My daughters and now even my son-in-law goes to him.  He is definitely the best family doctor ever, hands down!

name: Jasmine Fortune
text: Absolutely THE BEST of the BEST!!! Dr. Andrews is so personable and really takes time with each of his patients to talk to them and develop a treatment plan that everyone is pleased with.  He is the only doctor I trust!!

name: Dre Ballew
text: Worst Dr. experience ever- Seen him on 2 visits for an excruciating pain in my foot & migranes. Both visits had approx 45min wait to be seen past my appt time. Gave me excersises for my foot due it feeling it was a sprain even though I expressed the pain was greater than a sprain. I could barely walk 9 out of 10 days. I had to request Xrays. Didn't even address my migraine compliant. No prescription for pain. On 2nd visit, states Xrays showed arthritis. Still no prescription for pain or suggestion for possible treatment (such as stem cell). Instead, focuses on high blood pressure... I can barely walk some days & you want to talk about my blood pressure & tell me to buy a blood pressure machine. Hasnt been high in yrs, including 1st visit 30days prior.. STILL doesnt address migraines & refers me to someone else. STILL nothing for either of the 2 pain related issues. Also fails to fill out my medical papers for work correctly & needed them corrected bc my job doesn't accept Dr. excuses. What he did fill out, he didn't sign so they were useless. I called literally about 45 times, during business hrs, and only got someone 5 times, (which their only open til 430pm, M-Thurs, take an hr & half lunch & are not conveniently located). Of the 5 times someone answered & said I'd get a call back, I got 1. I have the call logs to prove it. Yet, if I immediately call from a different phone, someone will answer. Obviously they screen calls. Fiinally gave up since Dr. refused to correct paperwork as I needed it. A waste of time & money. This office is a joke. I referred someone at my job to him at 1st but quickly contacted them and apologized for my mistake. I wouldn't refer anyone here.

name: erica glass
text: This doctor really disappointed me. I only saw him once but that was enough. I discovered I had a fibroid the size of a grapefruit in my uterus. I called  to get some pain meds. he gave me  an anti inflammatory. All women know when your on your cycle it can be uncomfortable well multiply that by 5 and you will understand what I was going through. True enough I had be carrying it for a while however, for me to have to go to an E.R. because my doctor won't listen means that it has gotten to the point where i can't stand it. SO doctors listen to your patients!

name: HUNTSVILLE PR
text: Great doctor. Always know exactly what the issue is

text: I couldn't have asked for a better experience. Everyone was  super kind, helpful, and quick to help. I've put off seeing a doctor for a very long time and I'm glad I chose this place for my first visit and got help from Rachel and Meagan. Thank you!

name: Terri Evans
text: We were looking for a new family care provider - one that would seem to listen to you and discuss with you in terms you can understand. Ginger and the staff here are fantastic! Great addition to Millbrook!

name: Janet Larsen
text: Spectacular, caring, professional, efficient  and patient centered treatment. I have finally found a medical facility providing thorough and complete care. Thank you for bringing back a much needed place to call our medical "home".

name: Chris Tarantino
text: Great caring doctor and staff.  It's like being apart of a small family.  I would recommend this place to anyone.  They are prompt accepting appointments and don't keep you waiting.

name: Bridgett Wright
text: Ginger and her staff are great! She takes the time and listen to you and you don't feel rush when you come there. She makes you feel very comfortable to talk to about your health. And the staff is always friendly.!!!

name: Gregory Jordan
text: My dad drove to the emergency room and a few days later, they discharged him at 10:00pm after calling a 3rd emergency contact we had listed to tell them he had fallen, after talking and laughing earlier that day, that night he couldn't speak or barely move all the way home and had to take him to st.vincents the next morning, he died a few days later, if you love the person you might be taking to the hospital in the future,  I beg you don't take them to this hospital!!!

Will not go back.

name: Rozilyn Peyton
text: I consider myself fortunate to have Dr Michelle Jackson as my primary care physician. I’m confident in her knowledge and skills as a physician, I trust her to offer me reasonable care options and, I appreciate the personal interest she has demonstrated towards me as an individual.

name: susan alberto
text: Not sure about the other bad reviews. Dr. Jackson is treating my mom who has Alzheimer's and has been wonderful. We have never waited long for an appointment, call back, email, or referral. She is caring and offers common sense and reasonable options for care. My mom loves her!

name: Sandy Whitfield
text: Dr. Jackson has treated me and my family for years.  She’s a awesome doctor.  She is a very caring Doctor.

name: Chris Brazeal
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Jackson for years. She is very caring and personable. She generally cares about my overall health and how my life is going. She keeps a great staff that knows me by name and keeps up with my family. I would strongly recommend her if you are looking for a primary health doctor. Keep up the good work!

name: noahsmamma05
text: Warmly greeted upon arrival despite fact they were helping other patients. Staff was very friendly and personable, making me feel very welcome. Dr Jackson was very knowledgeable and took concern with my issues and addressed all questions. Appreciate a Dr that doesn’t have one hand on the knob while talking. Will be back and highly recommend!

name: Lorie Walley
text: I've seen Dr. Jackson for years ..20 or so. I went to her new practice today, waited 30 minutes or so in the reception area with 3 people ahead of me in the reception, I was in room #1.. I was the patient room almost 2 hours. I love her care but I hope this isn't the norm.

name: Cherie Culver
text: Dr. Michelle Jackson has been my physician for 20 plus years. She has always been kind and caring to me and my family. I highly recommend Dr. Jackson  and her staff to take care of you and your family’s health needs. Her nurse Mimi is the best.

name: Freddy Freddy New
text: If you like waiting 2+ hours to see your doctor, this is the clinic for you. If you like calling your doctor's office 3 or 4 times before someone answers, this is the clinic for you. If you like waiting weeks to get a refills, this is the clinic for you. Completely incompetent staff. Save yourself the trouble and find a different physician.

name: Brandi Bailey
text: Dr. Jackson is very attentive and makes sure you are taken care of. I highly recommend her.

name: Nathan Parmer
text: Office never knows anything if you call and ask questions. That is if you can get them answered a phone without hanging up on you. Even if you have an appointment you have to sit and wait at least two extra hours to see the doctor.

name: artgirl
text: I had been going to mobile diagnostic and medical clinic for 20 something years...over the past year, I was becoming more and more unhappy with the way the practice was set up and also the care given to me by primary... I thought I needed a change... I searched to find another primary who was connected with usa hospital... I know now...that I have found my new primary...Dr. Michelle Jackson... she is kind...thoughtful...and thorough...she ordered tests... I told her my concerns...she gave me advice... I was impressed and I haven't been impressed with a doctor in a long time... I was tired of going thru a switchboard to talk to a nurse and then have them never call me back at md&mc...i called Dr. Jackson's nurse line...and I was able to talk to a nurse right then and there... I felt I was given good advice thru Jay... I am confident that I made the right choice in becoming a patient of Dr. Jackson...Also the front desk staff and nurses were friendly...and nice...it all so refreshing to finally be taken care of by a great doctor and her great staff...:)

name: June Hearn
text:
I have been trying for 4 days to get refills on my prescriptions. I FINALLY had a person answer the office phone yesterday and was told I could pick up my prescription today (a prescription that cannot be called in) and assumed the second prescription was called in. Luckily, I called my pharmacy to see if prescription was called in and it had NOT. Went to pick up prescription and had to wait over 30 minutes to get it. Asked about other prescription and was told it would be called in. Got to pharmacy and only half my prescription was called in. Called office 3 times before a person answered and was very rude. This was at 2pm this afternoon and it's 5 hours later and pharmacy said it has NOT been called in yet And they have sent TWO requests to Dr. Jackson's office.
I have called on other occasions because I was not feeling well, and NEVER heard back from ANYONE from her office. I am very frustrated with the care I have not been receiving. I should NOT be treated like this and it should not take 5 days to get refills on regular medication.

name: Chuck
text: I have been seeing Dr.Jackson, I have ALWAYS been treated like I am the only patient there. When I walk in I and other patients they normally greeted. I was treated for IBS for years and Dr.Jackson ran a test and it was pancreatitis. I trust her TOTALLY with my health. She literally saved my life, she has been able to control my chronic pancreatitis. Before I seen her I was in the hospital almost monthly, she has got my chronic pancreatitis under control to where I can live with it. Her staff always makes sure that I have my meds and my refills BECAUSE I CALL A WEEK BEFORE I RUN OUT OF MY MEDICINE. I CALL THE PHARMACY AS DESCRIBED ON THE ANSWERING SERVICE BEFORE YOU SPEAK TO THEM and it's posted in the clinic room to. The people that had the most complaints about her are patients that are just trying to find some type of drugs and she is not going to give it to them. BEST DOCTOR IN MOBILE!!! The office is new and clean. And it doesn't hurt that they have something good playing on the TV while you're waiting. Keep up the good work 💪!!!

name: Kristina Coleman
text: Dr Jackson is amazing.

name: quicklady
text: Had to walk out. Waited over 2hrs after time of appointment.

name: Mindy Schramke
text: My dr

name: Mindy Schramke
text: My dr

name: Margo Bryant
text: The nurse practitioner here is unprofessional to say the least. Elena Robertson is her name. She didn't do an exam on my family member, just sent him on his way in terrible pain. When confronted, she lied and said she offered solutions she did not offer. She just argued with me. Very unprofessional. She said an x-ray would have given him too much radiation. OK. That's a first. There is no office manager in this office, so there is no recourse. An email to the corporate office was not answered. Complete waste of office fee and time.

name: James Townsend
text:
So friendly and fast. They are very knowledgeable and professional. No matter how the the mood customer gives off they where able to keep claim and work through issues (observations of other customers while there).

The check  Process 2as fast and easy with the tablet. All digital. And if you are missing required things like iD , as long as you have a picture your good. I did not have a co pay for my visit, butothers there paided about $30

name: Dennis Utz
text: Walked in yesterday feeling horrible. Been coughing, fever, too much mucus. The receptionist quickly took my personal info and made me an appointment. I was then quickly taken back to be weighed, get blood pressure, etc.  After that they took me to an exam room. Waited for the Dr only a short time. Dr. Campbell was very professional listening to my symptoms and then gave me a quick exam. He recommended I get an xray to check out my lungs. I thought, oh great. Now I gotta go somewhere else, but NO!  They had a xray room right there in the clinic!!  Awesome. After getting a few xray photos the Dr said I probably had a bronchial infection. Gave me a shot of antibiotics and prescribed some to take for 5 days. Excellent care!!  They even called today to check on me and give me some more advice!!  Best care I've had in a long time!!  Thanks Dr. Campbell and AFC!!

name: Johnje Jasper
text:
I had a close friend seen here recently on a Friday. The MD forgot to call in the script and the office told them to call back on Tuesday. Thats 4 days without treatment!!

Delaying care by 4 DAYS may result in my friend becoming more SICK due to the incompetence of this office. 0 stars.

name: Jessica Truong
text: I had a very good experience today. I have been having sinus infection symptoms for 1 week. A dr at MD Live was convinced I had Covid (over the phone) and would not prescribe me anything. I saw this place is doing rapid covid tests and I also knew my husband had a very good experience taking our daughter here a few years ago. So I came here on my lunch break. The receptionist was very friendly and got me checked in right away. Then almost right away I was taken back by a very friendly gentleman who even held my hand during the covid testing since I have high anxiety. Thankfully my test was negative. Then the nurse practitioner saw me and he was also friendly. I got some shots and a prescription and I’m sure I will be feeling much better very soon. In and out fairly quickly and easily. I highly recommend to anyone in the Athens/Madison area.

resp.text: Dear Jessica, Thanks for choosing us and leaving such a great review! It is truly touching to know you think so highly of us! We hope to continue exceeding your expectations with 5 star service. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Courtney Michael
text: I definitely wouldn't recommend going here. Waited in waiting room for over 2 hours. Front desk staff were nice but besides that the others weren't that great. I was not pleased with the "medical professional" that I was seen by, Elena Robertson only reason I know her name is it was on my papers. I had to wait an excessive amount of time in the back as well for vitals, and blood to be drawn. I will not be back due to the fact when the doctor came in she treated me as more of an inconvenience than a patient. She came in said "You having symptoms? You know this test isn't accurate?" And then just walked out. Not very professional. I had to go find someone and ask if I was ready to go.

name: Richard Kirkruff
text: Should be called we dont care not urgent care waited three hours for my girlfriend to get a covid test and they were not busy 3 ppl in the waiting room area. Your better off going to Wal-Mart and buying a box of band-aids and a bottle of hydrogen peroxide

resp.text: Hi Richard, thank you for posting your positive review. Our team here at American Family Care - Athens (256) 278-3000 is committed to providing high-quality customer service, and we’re thrilled to hear that we made a good impression on you. We hope you’ll visit us again soon.

name: Ashtian Harrell
text: This place is TERRIBLE!!! I waited 4 hours just to be seen today. All I got was a covid test, and whenever I asked the DR for a cough medicine (I have asthma and my cough is terrible) she told me just to use my inhaler and that it’s not good for my lungs to suppress my cough. All they checked me for was covid, my test came back negative, and the doctor told me I still have it. The ONLY person with a LICK of common sense in that whole building is the poor boy working up front. God bless him. I will NEVER come back here and I have never met such a STUPID and UNPROFESSIONAL doctor in my life!!!

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional.Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Zachary Luna
text: Went there today for a sinus infection and all They wanna do was tell me Covid this in Covid that didn’t even do a check to see what my sinuses were doing and then sent me with antibiotics but couldnt tell me what I had because the doctor was being wishy washy. They don’t want to treat anything unless it’s covid they could care less what you really have they will just say it might be covid. I had no covid systems.

resp.text: We would like the chance to turn your experience around. If you are willing to give us another chance, please reach out to us at American Family Care - Athens (256) 278-3000  to speak to our manager directly.

text: Will never come here again. My husband waited 3 hours with a hand injury, just to be told they don't do xrays-- even though their website states clearly that they do. Should've read all the other negative reviews and known better. Lesson learned.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Derek Cox
text: Been here OVER two hours for a “rapid” Covid test. Was literally the 13th person in line. Keep being told “one person ahead of you”. Just be honest. Slowest clinic I’ve ever been too.

name: Jamiee Freeman
text: I would give this place negative stars if I could. I have been here before and have NEVER had any issues until now. Waited over 6 hours to see a doctor for uti symptoms. The doctor didn’t hardly see me. Did no exam and told me my symptoms weren’t consistent with a uti. Gave me meds for something totally different. (This is unrelated to me) but while I was waiting to be seen in my room I heard a nurse call a patient and tell her that they told her the wrong Covid results so if you are going up there for Covid testing don’t!!!!! Anyways I went to another urgent care the very next day and they immediately told me I have a uti and gave me medication for that. I am so upset. Do not visit they don’t care.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

text: This is an awesome walk-in clinic. Clean facility with spacing for Covid. Front desk staff are polite and efficient. Nurse Practitioners know what they are doing. Shout out to Erica, RN!

name: TJ Treviso
text: This place is a nightmare. Imagine yelling the staff at 10 am you have covid symptoms... waiting nearly 4 hours to get tested, charged the fee... then told they can't test you because you have symptoms. Tell people up front and not waste their time. Unorganized and unprofessional.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: James Smart
text: Waited for over 4hrs. I was told at hour 2 there were 6 people ahead of me. 1 hour later was told there were 4 ahead of me. Every person who walks in is handed the same tablet to log information in and spread germs. COVID test patients wait in lobby for hours as well. No one sanitizes the seats for those people either.  Madison ER is faster than heee as well as Approxie Urgent Care.

name: Britni Bethune
text: I actually like this urgent care; however, being 18 weeks pregnant and to know the lobby is packed with 8+ people and they're letting people sit INSIDE THE LOBBY to do COVID rapid testing makes me VERY, VERY uncomfortable. Especially when there's coughing and throat clearing going on. Why aren't patients who are being rapid tested asked to sit in their car until the test is administered, like other clinics? It is uncomfortable and alarming to know the person I'm sitting 3-6 feet away from is exposing symptoms of COVID openly and potentially exposing others, especially with longer than normal wait times and a full lobby. As mentioned, wait times are longer than normal - I waited about three and a half hours today.

resp.text: Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at American Family Care Athens (256) 278-3000 . We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Valentina Fuller
text: Amy was fantastic and explained well. Luis gave x-ray and was very patient and calming. Dara ll drew blood and one of the few times it literally didn’t even feel a pinch. Very thorough. Highly recommend if you can’t get in with your primary care physician.

resp.text: We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. Its experiences like yours that really keep us motivated! If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help.

name: Amy Harris Walker
text: It was the weekend and my son had a bad ear infection. The CRNP, Maggie Collins got him in and out. She was great with him, as were the nurses. Would definitely recommend!

name: Track Mom
text: A snail would provide faster service than this URGENT CARE” patients are waiting as long as 2.5 hours in the waiting room before being called back. Heaven forbid someone coming in needing actual urgent medical care they would die in the waiting room! The 2nd thing I noticed is they do not see patients in the order they come in they pick and choose by ethnicity who is seen first to last.

name: adam anderson
text: There is no reason for someone have to wait for a covid test for 4 hours NO ONE!!!!!! SHOULD BE IN AND OUT if I wanted to wait this long i should've just went to the hospital ridiculous how this money racket is going I will not ever recommend this place to no ONE!!!!!

name: Emily Taylor
text: My wait was over two hours but with the influx of Covid testing I did expect this for a walk-in appointment. During my wait I witnessed Endia and Andrew at the front desk show incredible patience and kindness, even with agitated patients and a medical emergency that disrupted the clinic. If they were flustered, I couldn’t pick up on it. That’s the kind of service we need, especially in medical offices. Kudos!

name: Amanda Stephens
text:
Everyone was very friendly and understanding. They actually took the time to listen to me and truly worked hard to try to pinpoint my situation. If I need a clinic again I'll definitely be back!

Amanda S.

text:
Dr. Akalonu was unbelievably rude to my daughter and myself. I was out of state when my daughter went to have her sore throat evaluated and I was on the phone when he came in to give her results of the rapid strep. He was rude, he dismissed my concerns and said she didn’t have mono because her tonsils weren’t swollen or red. Funny. She doesn’t have tonsils. He walked out on her before ensuring my questions were answered. He didn’t care to discuss anything with me and treated us more as an inconvenience to his schedule. I thought doctors were supposed to be more caring and compassionate but this one is not. He’s a joke. I wonder if his demeanor would have been more friendly had he known I’m also a provider and come from a long line of doctors and nurses.

I will say, the lady that was working the front desk was incredibly friendly, warm and kind and I appreciated her.

Within the hour, I started feeling better.  All this occurred around 6 hours ago.  I'll tell you, I feel 100 times better already.  I'm so proud and thankful for that crew.  Ty ty ty.  I recommend anyone to go there.   Thank you again, so much, guys.  :-)

name: Summer Mitchell
text: My husband has high BP and we went in today because our BP monitor was saying his BP was very high even though he takes his medication. We had called his primary family doctors office and she said he needed to come in and have it checked but she didn't have time to see him today so we went to AFC in Athens and they were so great! They office staff was extremely nice and the nurse that took us back to check my husbands BP was awesome. He is probably the nicest person I have ever met in a doctor's office even better than our family doctor. My husband hates doctors but the nurse made him feel so comfortable and relaxed. He talked to us with such respect and made you feel like he had known you for years. If the owner of this facility happens to see this you should give that male nurse a big ole raise because he was so polite and made the visit so much better just because he has an awesome personality! I would recommend this doctors office to anyone and I wish they could be my primary care office !

Greetings,

text: Stupid long wait

name: Nuke Life
text:
Not usually a wait in the lobby, if there is maybe 15 mins tops,  they test for everything to give an accurate diagnosis.  The staff is awesome always friendly.  This is my go to place if I am sick.  You could stay here for up to an hour or so for diagnosis waiting on the tests,  but it's worth it I never stay sick long after I come here.

I saw some people complaining about the time they have to wait after being seen,  there is always a minute clinic they could go to or Google search,  to get a guess at what's wrong instead of going through the testing to actually see what's wrong.  Just be patient and you will get better faster here.

name: Hope Sides
text: Clean facility, minimal wait time, friendly staff, and the nurse practitioner was very friendly- HOWEVER- I don’t reccomend taking young babies. After my pediatrician couldn’t see my daughter, (whole other issue 🙄) I decided to take her here.. she was diagnosed with an ear infection and given an antibiotic. After two full days, my daughter has not gotten any better, I would even venture to say she’s gotten worse. Checking over the antibiotic that was prescribed, I called the pharmacy where her last prescription was filled (which happened to be the exact same antibiotic for another ear infection she had). Only difference was the one that was prescribed to us at AFC was HALF the dose.. so it has done my LO absolutely no good up to this point. So now I’m forced to call my pediatrician back tomorrow and see if she will give another script (which I’m sure insurance will not pay for again in the same week- irrelevant because I will do what I have to do to get her better). But it’s a little disheartening having to watch your 11 month old suffer when it could have easily been avoided.

resp.text: Hope, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. Please reach out to us at (256) 278-3000 when you can so we can address this situation directly. Thank you and have a great day.

name: Abby Goggins
text: Poor experience using this place over the Christmas holidays.  Took my daughter in as soon as she woke up running fever and achy on Christmas Eve...took 4 1/2 hours due to computer problems they had and a busy waiting room!  The swabs they took were negative, but they assured me the strep would be sent off for culture.(false negatives are common when strep test is done early)  Two days later, my daughter clearly has strep throat...still running fever, very severe sore throat with white spots and pus in the back of it. I called back to check on test results and the culture hasn't even been sent off.  There was no care, concern or customer service on the phone.  I was hung up on after politely requesting a retest.  We will not be back here.

resp.text: Abby, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback about your experience with us. We would like the opportunity to make this up to you. Please contact our manager at (256) 278-3000 so we can make your experience a positive one.

name: Trevor Staub
text:
I understand that it is flu season and I was expecting to wait for an hour or two but here I am, three hours later and still haven't been seen. The TV in the lobby plays the same sports highlights from 3 months ago over and over which, while the least of my concerns, is incredibly annoying and mind numbing. I agree with the other reviewer, that just about any other doc in the box would be better than this one.
Also, I found it strange that the technician or whatever you would call him took all of my symptom information down on an iPad that crashed once while he was getting info from me. I'm all about saving the environment and going paperless but he spent unnecessary time and effort trying to get that thing working again when he could have just written it on a piece of paper.

The doctor was very kind and made up for lack of punctuality with a quick and accurate diagnosis.
I guess the 3 and a half hour wait comes with going to a doc in the box.

text: From the lady at check out the nurse just rude bad attitude and the doctor with no personality so brief  was a waste of visit bad experience never again first and last

name: Mashayla Graham
text: I don't know how the doctor is here but I was calling this office as a new patient the person that schedule new patient appointments was very rude as hell Dr. Abt you need a new person to assist patient on your appointment schedule because your employee ran me off with her rude attitude and told me I need to remove the doctor name off my insurance card and how rude!!!

name: RVPeak
text: I liked nothing about this location.  When you asked questions about your health or billing, they were condescending as if they were the professionals and I should accept everything they said as if it were gospel.  I called ahead to ensure that they could help me with a physical and was told yes.  Nothing could have been farther from the truth.  After paying to get a physical, I was told that they could start the physical, (do about 3%) and come back for the rest of it on Saturday.  They failed to read the paperwork that I brought, I had to go back and explain what I really needed.  Every time I asked a question, the person I talked to would walk away, form a committee and put it to a vote.  This location and the one on airport road needs to be closed.

name: Re Bow
text:
I live right next door, so I've tried to come here a few times. My God they are so awful. Rude and condescending reception, and the doctors just throws an easy diagnosis and prescription at you without even barely looking at you.

Probably good for minor cuts and bruises if you don't mind waiting 4 hours.

Read the rest of the reviews here. They are not wrong.

name: Ken Reed
text:
Went to AFC Daphne last night after suffering from congestion for a few days. Arrived at 5:30pm and was checked in. Everything went smoothly until the primary guy came in. Don't know his name, fairly young, tall and heavy. He was obviously anxious to go home. Came in and asked a couple of questions and then told me he couldn't do anything for me because I needed to see a cardiologist because it was 100% a heart issue and I needed a stress test ASAP. I tried to ask questions but he was having nothing to do with that, just apologized that he had to deliver such devastating news and I had to leave.

Went home, obviously worried but thought I would get a second opinion first thing this morning before calling a cardiologist. Thank God I did. I went to Eastern Shore Urgent Care in Malbis and found out I have bronchitis and absolutely no heart issues. They are great there and after a few hours I already feel much better and the congestion is about gone.

For you own sake, don't go here!!!

name: Bill Kynes
text: This is it updated post for my previous post. I received a message from the owner saying they would reach out to me to resolve the problem not the case. I have spoken with the office manage directly your corporate office three different people. I just received billing to my insurance company for procedure that was never done when I was there for the visit. Therefore I'm asking for  Dr Bruce Irwin to contact me or if they have somebody there they call boss. I've contacted my insurance company and made them aware of this they're investigating your office manager has all the details and made copies please respond thank you. As of today nobody has contacted me from American family care my insurance company is doing an internal investigation they just contacted me. My advice is not to go to that facility if you have to keep all copies of procedures that they performed.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We sincerely apologize about the issues you experienced, and we hope to make this right. Please reach out to American Family Care - Daphne so we can rectify this issue.

name: Mary Avera
text:
Been here since they opened and still haven't been out of the lobby, its been over an hour. I have been constantly vomiting all night and there is no triage system. I'm desperate for help and they just don't care how long everyone is waiting.

Edit* once I got into a room the nurses and doctors were very nice

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback! We hope you have a great day

name: AnnMarie Jackson
text:
Getting the covid test was pretty simple. Not a lot of options in Alabama for it, especially on the weekends. I came to visit from out of state so it was required to get a test done. I was tested on a Saturday,  12/5  they told me it would be sent off Monday and would take 5-8 days. A very long and slow turn around. My test was ordered on 12/9 and a couple days later was emailed my results which was actually empty. I tried multiple times calling to speak to someone with no answer. I sent my step dad there to see if he could have someone call me. On the first ring, now someone answers since he was in front of them.  We tried the same morning multiple times,my mom even let it ring for 9 minutes. Very frustrating. The emailed results to me which is a horrible copy to read. Would not recommend if visiting from out of state or need a quick turn around for results, period
Go to another town or state.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: hayden harper
text: Worst experience ever at a walk in clinic. I had three people in front of me when I got there and I waited for and hour and 45 minutes. DO NOT recommend going here. The front office staff is also extremely rude and not helpful at all.

name: Jessica Richardson
text:
Poor customer service and communication. Went to get a Covid test for traveling internationally (needed to present to the local government) and waited 2 hours for a 1 minute test. We made the staff aware of the reasoning behind the test up front. And again when the PA came in to discuss and ask question about my exposure (reiterating the fact that it was purely for travel purposes). Have not yet received results and will be detained and made to retake the test to be allowed outside the airport. When called to ask about the results today, was told that if they had known we needed results quicker, they would have sent us else where.
Super frustrating and a complete waste of time and money to end up empty handed.
Will not be back to this location for any visits.

***Edit***
Still waiting, 7 days after testing, for a result that should have taken "3-5 days". Not only was my trip missed and cancelled due to the extended lead time of this result, but I have yet to be contacted or given any information from American Family in regards to this issue.

resp.text: We would like the chance to turn your experience around. If you are willing to give us another chance, please reach out to us at  American Family Care - Daphne (251) 626-5700 to speak to our manager directly.

name: Aden Xagod
text: They charged me $365 in addition to the $175 cost of my initial visit. floor blood work i didn't ask for. The nurse told me they where going to run some simple test, that would be covered by my visit cost of $175 then i get a bill for $365 in the mail.  BE CAREFUL when dealing with these people

name: Bryan Saifi
text: They need to state in there phone recorded message and On their website more clearly that they won’t see you if you come in after 5pm despite being open to 6pm.

name: Reese Grantham
text: I am sitting in the waiting room and was here 20 minutes before hey opened only to get a covid test-nothing else. They are not efficient with their time nor patients. It is an hour and 45 minutes I have been sitting here and I was 8th in line this morning. I am unsure why it takes this long to get people in for a covid test.

resp.text: If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!
