text: Dr. Shandi Shiver is a wonderful doctor and person.      I have no insurance and pay out of pocket and I don’t mind because she takes excellent care of me and all my medical needs. Also the staff is so nice and helpful, especially Brittany. I highly recommend AFC.

name: KOOL May
text: My mother stole all my identifications, I did have my medical card, but I was denied access to get seen. The next day, I did an online doctor's appointment and was told to go the E.R., where I was diagnosed with Covid 19 related pneumonia.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: JAn G
text: Slowest urgent care I have ever been at! Still waiting after 2 hours with four other people waiting to be seen. Watched 6 people walk out and no one called back! I am stuck here but I assure you, I will never choose to come back here nor will I recommend this place.

name: Justin Stapler
text: Thought I had covid 19. Made an appointment. Waited for an hour in my truck with no a.c. I finally walked back in and ask if they were even close. I'm cooking out here. She looked and said oh Ive been calling you. No missed calls on my phone and full service. I showed her that. Then she double checked my number. She had the correct number. So I believe I was just skipped all together which I'm sure was an accident. Just own the mistake but they didn't... Upon realizing that. They rushed me back for a test. Well.... that was 19 days ago. Still no answer. Ive called 3 times now. To be told they are sorry. I should have results soon. Glad I'm not dead.... Hope if it was covid I did not make anyone else sick along the way. I get the medical field is crazy right now but this is just negligent.

name: T
text: Unacceptable wait time. I waited 3 hours before I left with the results of my 15min “Rapid” Covid Test. There were no more than 4 people in the waiting room when I arrived.

name: tj williams
text: Wonderful doctors office. Every person I came into contact with were nice and extremely knowledgeable in their job! Will definitely be my new doctors office!

name: lilsexymexy
text: I LOVE coming to American Family Care and have been coming here for over 10yrs now.  The entire team there is great and I absolutely LOVE Shandi, the very knowledgeable nurse practitioner Dr. Robinson has.  The two of them make for an amazing team, along with all of the other staff members.  I would recommend this clinic to anyone new in the area looking for a primary doctor or urgent care!!  Thanks AFC for always taking such great care of me and my family members, 10yrs and going strong!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: A. Clark
text: Covid-19 has really overwhelmed them. Do not expect your phone calls to be answered.... it will only happen if you are incredibly lucky. I called TEN different times on Friday and never once got an answer [even after letting the phone ring for 10 min straight once. Today I decided to let the phone ring until someone answered, it took almost 15 minute before someone was able to pick up... the young lady was very polite and provided me with my test results over the phone. It is completely understandable for them to be experiencing problems in such a difficult time, I understand, but it is still VERY frustrating and unfair to the patients. Management needs to assign one employee to phone duty during this busy time, that should be their only responsibility, to attend to the phone lines.

name: Autumn B
text:
I was left in a room for 50 minutes without any indication of when I would receive results or how long I would be waiting. When I asked the receptionist on duty if it was okay to recieve my results over the phone, she snapped at me and said it wasn’t possible. She said to go wait in my room until someone would come to me to which I apologized and made my way back. I had forgotten which exam room I was in and asked for help from my nurse, I heard the receptionist chide “I have told her three times to get back to her room, she is just wandering around.” Which wasn’t true.

My nurse and doctor were both very kind and understanding, I just wish that I was given more instruction on the procedure, which I was not. I was put into a room with little room to ask questions, and no one informed me on what was happening or how long I would be waiting.

name: Wade Burcham
text: I recommend you plan for a full day adventure if you go here. Not sure if their time estimates are lies or they have no idea and just say what they think you want to hear.

text: The absolute worst. Eastern Shore urgent is way better

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! Our teams strive to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out. We can't wait to see you again, have a great day!

name: sneerious grinch
text: Not a good place to seek medical care. I went in with a staph infection amd told the dr it was a staph infection. Dr Robinson looked at it and agreed it was a staph infection. He did not drain it and now after running tje antibiotics wants me to come back in because they did not do a culture at the first visit. Why wouldn't they do a culture on the first visit? And if he knew it was staph infection then why did he prescribe a weal antibiotic? I will he charged double for the negligence on their part. I think sometimes people get burnt out at their job over time and I think Dr Robinson past time to retire. I would seek a different afc or a different means of medical care altogether. Theres a good chance this location will be negligent and unprofessional in their practicing medicine. It's really disturbing that a medical professional can be so uncaring about a patient's health and well beinh

name: Liz Wharton
text: Dictated by Barb J. “Went in today early, I suspected a sinus infection. No cars in lot, no patients in lobby. Did paperwork. Sat there for 55 min. Saw PA for 2 min. Left after shot and told to go pick up Rx they would call in. 4 hours later, called pharmacy to see if Rx was there, no it was not. Called AFC in Daphne to ask them to send in the Rx.”

resp.text: Please contact us at (251) 626-5700 when you have an opportunity, and we will be more than happy to try and turn your experience around.

name: John Smith
text:
Please note the outstanding professional service provided by Shandi Shiver. CRNP.  She was very caring, knowledgeable and took extremely good care of my bronchitis issue.  She took extraordinary and detailed steps for my recovery process and inhaler instructions that I had never been instructed in.  She is a credit to this care center and the medical profession.

I will pass this onto friends and family in need of Excellence in Family Medical Care.

Thanks again
Captain (JD) John Donnelly Smith, Daphne, AL

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! Our teams strive to deliver an excellent experience, and are glad you found this to be the case during your visit. If you have further needs or questions, please reach out. We can't wait to see you again, have a great day!

text: American Family Care business is a scam! They are double dipping with insurance money.  This place needs to be closed and an investigation completed. They lie about what they are doing with extra money they are taking. DO NOT GO THERE!!!!

name: Amber Parker
text:
I came here Saturday with sores on my throat, fever, body aches, headache; and just feeling miserable. I was tested for the flu and it came back negative. The nurse practitioner that doesn’t work at the clinic was apparently filling in for the real
Doctor that wasn’t able to come in for the day. She never diagnosed me and just decided to prescribe me tamiflu when I didn’t have the flu, the medication was not covered much By my insurance and wasn’t the medication I needed so I called and told them and they decided to prescribe me pills for a cough which I made it clear I did not have a cough at all at the time. Now it’s tuesday and I’m having intense nose bleeds, my chest is cold, and Im dry coughing and my throat and neck is sore radiating to my ears. I called and told them I needed something to help me and they said I’d have to pay ANOTHER co pay to see the real doctor because he doesn’t go by what other “doctors” have said. I feel this is not how the situation should have been handled so I am still miserable when I’ve reached out for help several times.

resp.text: It's upsetting to hear that your experience was anything but stellar. We would like to work towards a resolution, so if you are willing, please reach out to us at (251) 626-5700 to discuss this further.

name: Lindsey Hirst
text:
This is the worst urgent care center in Daphne! I've been to the other Urgent care centers in the area several times and have never experienced the issues I had at American Family Care in Daphne.
I waited a very, very long time to be seen, and there were only two or three other patients in there. The nurse wasn't very confident with his blood drawing skills and didn't seem very knowledgeable. Then, I drove all the way to the pharmacy to find out they never called my prescription in!! The office closed at 6, and it was 6:20pm when I realized this. I was told by the answering service I had to wait until tomorrow to call and get it sent over. I was very unhappy that I had to wait another day to get my medications. I felt horrible and needed the antibiotics asap! I will never go back here!

resp.text: Hi Lindsey, thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent experience. We are disappointed to hear that you are not satisfied with your visit. Please reach out to us at (251) 626-5700 so we may assist you in moving forward towards a resolution.

name: Kelsey Vrieze
text:
I have been to other urgent care centers in Daphne, but decided to go to this one because it's close to our house. I was told by one of the office personnel that "for insurance plans with high deductibles we charge $100." In my insurance booklet from BCBS it says my Co pay for an urgent care center is $50. After telling her that we have a $300 per person deductible, she told me I was wrong and that my deductible was $7800 or $7900 which isn't true. If I could post photos of our State Employee Insurance Board book from BCBS Alabama it plainly states that we each have a $300 per person deductible per calendar year, I would. We have a $7800 Maximum out of pocket cost for one person and $14500 for a family, but she clearly stated deductible. I'm going to assume they were talking about our maximum out of pocket costs instead of deductible, but even then, that shouldn't be something that urgent care centers even consider.

I went to Eastern Shore Urgent Care Center in November or December and they didn't bill me $100 for seeing the doctor. I paid a $50 copay. I am going to go back to that one even though it is out of my way. Always be sure to look at your insurance booklet and read it every year for updates. There are some doctors offices and urgent care centers that will try to charge you more.

Edit: I went to Eastern Shore Urgent Care center and my co pay was $35. I called and confirmed with BCBS that my deductible isn't in the $7000s. I'm not sure if she misread my insurance or what happened, but I shouldn't have to pay extra for services that my insurance MIGHT not cover. They are basically saying that they are going to charge you extra because you may not pay your bill for services rendered so we will have an account. I would rather go to an urgent care center where I'm billed a Co pay and then sent a bill for extra services that my insurance didn't cover.

resp.text: Kelsey Herring, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (251) 626-5700. We look forward to hearing from you.

text: The worst care I have ever received. I came up to AFC to receive a physical & tb test for work and ended up coming there 5 times and left with nothing resolved. They proceeded to take my money and return it because they weren’t able to do anything without knowing they could or not. Received the tb test after the third time I was there and came back three days later for the reading and they told me they couldn’t see my bc the system was down. So I went up there today and it’s too late and have to pay AGAIN for a new test when it was there fault in the beginning. Proceeded to tell me they couldn’t do nothing for me and not once a sorry or apology. Also told me they couldn’t do the physical/tb test on the same day but yet they did it for other people. Only reason they told me that because they closed in a hour and the Dr already left. All they did was cause problems. Worst experience I have ever had.

name: Donald Goram
text: My son went to this clinic on Saturday Jan 28th 2017. We suspected that he had the flue. After being examined the doctor said it was viral and gave him a Steroid Shot.  My son's doctors was not open on Saturday, that was the reason for using American Family Care. Monday morning he was still sick and we took him to his Doctor. My wife noticed that the test procedure was different they swabbed both nosterals unlike American Family care who just stuck the swab in and pulled it out.  I called and explained this to the office manager. She said that they often have patients that come back and test positive on their second visit. That you don't have to actually have tow swab both nosterals. Bottom line my sons doctor told my wife that the method they used to test is the correct method. We were told that Tamifu would not be effective being that he has had the flue to long. We spent $175.00 for the office visit out of pocket, I suppose we would have spent the same amount again if we had to take him back. I would not recommend this medical facility.

name: Crystal Harmon
text: My family and I have been patients of Dr. Pajaro for almost 20 years.  She is very thorough and shows care and compassion to every patient.  My husband started seeing her when she was at an Urgent Care office.  When she left and started her own practice, he followed.  Shortly thereafter I started seeing her as well.  Since then my Mother, Sister, Brother-in-law, and daughter are all patients.  My daughter is now 18  and we were patients before we even planned her.  Longevity speaks volumes and, as you can tell, I recommend her highly!!!

name: Kellie Hollingsworth
text: I drive from Gadsden to see Dr. Pajaro.  She is extremely thorough and yes, sometimes there is a wait, but when it's your turn she treats you like you are the only patient she has that day. Any PA's or refills...they are on top of it! THAT alone is hard to get a doctor to do! I plan to stay with her as long as I can. She's good at what she does. She actually CARES! She's understanding that I have a good drive to get to her office and works with me on that. Labs are often done in Gadsden as well as emergency doctor visits. So...with that being said I dont understand the comment about the girl who changed PCP (primary care physician) ??? The staff is awesome! They ALL know me on a first name basis and treat me like family!

text: My appointment was prompt, I did not have to wait a long time to be seen by the doctor.  I was seen within five minutes of my sign-in.   Excellent and caring staff!

name: Dwight Wells
text: Had a wonderful experience at Selma family care , they took great care of me, from the time I walked in with Misty smiling at the front desk,  to seeing Np Ellen and Dr Bohannon as well as their wonderful nurses Danielle and Kim......They were all very caring and professional......

name: Ethel Byrd
text: Everyone I personally in countered at this medical practice were professional, courteous and showed me great respect. I would highly recommend Mrs. Ellen Mitchell to anyone as their medical provider. She shows her patients she cares about their health issues.

name: Teresa Smitherman
text: Everyone there is so friendly, like family. I just live Dr Bohannon. He is straight forward and honest with you. He is a great doctor.

name: Carla Bennett
text: I would not think of using any other practice in this area. I always feel truly cared for by the entire staff. Courteous and professional every time.

name: TOBY JOHNSON
text: I have never been a patient here,  but as a Case Manager at a personal injury law firm, I have never had so much trouble getting records and billing from a doctors office as I have here.  It literally took 6 months of constant faxing the request, phone calls and unanswered voicemails.  When I finally would not take no for an answer, the lady tried to chastise me for stating the above facts. And like everyone else who didn't do their job, she blamed COVID. I guess if you don't do your job properly, blame it on COVID.  Cant get your dog to pee outside, blame it on COVID.  Cant get your car to start, blame it on COVID.  As a citizen of Selma who is dedicated to helping its citizens, I find it odd that a doctors office, whose purpose is to help the citizens of the Selma, is so disorganized and has a blase' faire attitude when it comes to their job. I know that a doctors office's job is not to send out medical records requests, however, it is a part of their job.  If you don't want to do your job, stay home and let someone who WANTS to work do it for you.  Also, if you have no idea about customer service or how to speak to someone who has a legitimate issue, maybe, just maybe, you should take a class on professionalism and not just rely on the fact that you got the job because someone vouched for you. This is proof that the Good Ol Boy network is still viable and thriving in Selma.

name: Marianne Mccants
text: My service was excellent I had a fantastic morning with my doctor thank you again

name: Eric Barnes
text: Totally Happy with the looking after I get at Dr. Bohannons off they actually care unlike other places I've been can't say enough good about them

name: Me Armstrong
text: Truly “Family” care... Dr. Bohannon is beyond thorough with his medical care and advice. His is the epitome of what efficiency in medical care should strive to be. He takes the time to explain what’s going on in terms you can understand and offers advice and treatments that are reachable. He also has surrounded himself with an outstanding, caring staff that always go out of their way to make sure your visit is a great one.

name: Toot Lawrence
text: Everybody is just awesome

name: Carolyn Jones
text: He is a fantastic man and Dr. We are so blessed to have him. The staff that is has now is wonderful,friendly and always smiling .Tammy is superb if at any time we can't see the Dr. We feel we are in good hands with her. To us this office and Medical staff out rates the other offices. Thanks to you all.

name: Lee Tate
text: I’m VERY satisfied with this practice. The staff is ALWAYS helpful and the office environment is professional, quiet, and friendly. Dr. Bohannon ALWAYS spends time with his patients, making sure they understand what’s happening.

name: Stephanie Marche
text:
I've been a patient of Dr. Bohannon for over 5 years and I have the utmost respect for and gratitude to him.  I trust his diagnostic ability implicitly and have felt "safe" in his care from my very first visit .
At the age of 61 and having lived in 8 states (north & south) throughout my life, I've known a virtual kaleidoscope of doctors; including those that used to make housecalls (back when dinosaurs roamed the earth!lol) and I can honestly say that, in my opinion, he's the best!
One of the many things that I respect about him is his seemingly lack of ego.  When he's not sure of a cause and/or diagnosis, he tells you exactly that and he searches until he does know.  Because of this, when he does diagnosis an illness, you know you can have complete faith in his words and his treatment plans.
But, to me, one of the greatest things about him is his endless patience. No matter how full his waiting room is or how harried the staff may be, once he enters the treatment room, you have his full and unhurried attention; he never displays even a hint of impatience or need to be elsewhere.  I'm virtually deaf and have a myriad of health issues; I frustrate my own family at times and I'm sure there have been times in the last 5 years that I've had to have frustrated Dr. Bohannon as well!  The fact that I've not once seen him show it says everything about the young man and physician that he is.
If you want the best medical care, in the most respectful environment, there is no better doctor...north or south!!!
I wrote this over 2 YEARS ago and stand by all written 100%!!!
He now has a PA, Ellen, and if the wait for an appt with Dr Bohannon is too long, you will NOT be disappointed in ANY with this extraordinary young woman. She too has the "patience of a saint", never rushes through your appt and really LISTENS!!  I'd highly recommend her as well🙏

name: Jule Booker
text: Staff is always so friendly and thorough. Never a long wait. Doctor takes plenty of time. Love this practice!

name: Laura Lee Williams
text: Dr. Bohannon is very professional and spends an adequate amount of time with his patients. The wait time is reasonable. The office is clean and the entire staff is friendly and welcoming.

name: Arenetta Sajna
text: Dr Bohannan is a very sweet and compassionate doctor. He actually comes in and makes you feel as if you’re being “heard”......this is something that the medical field has sadly evolved from. But, I appreciate this doctor and his staff for being professional and caring.

name: Carolyn Roy
text: So many good things I can say about Dr. Bohannon and there staff it’s of importance that the patients is cared for, not just about monetary however the care and health of the patients, he and his staff have exceeded and beyond my expectations of a doctor most of all he listens and hear you, he has the best nurse in history my entire family goes to him/Tammy Masson, I totally love them!

text: The staff is very polite and professional. Dr. Bohannon is very personable, very professional and takes as much time with you as needed.

name: Linda Fortune
text: Dr. Bohanon has been so inspirational to me. Dr. Bohanon is more than just a Dr. to his patients. He is a friend. When my mom passed away in January 2017,Dr. Bohanon told me how sorry he was that he did not visit her in the hospital. He did not just say this to me on one visit,he said it to me for several visits. I could tell that he meant it too. Moma loved Dr.Bohanon, as do I. His staff....all of them....are such sweet and professional people. You all could not have put a more pleasant lady at the check in. I do not want to just point out one staff member but, Emily is so nice to EVERYONE.  FROM answering the phone,to checking in, to opening the doors for elderly, to even showing people to the restroom. text: I went for an abscess and was told it was a rash. I knew it was so today I got a second opinion. When they went to Lance the abscess open, they had to numb it. It didn't numb completely because the infection was real deep. I won't be coming back to your office again. I see malpractice in your future. She didn't even check the site. text: This practice is absolutely not ethical concerning a patient's time and money. They make you come in for all information, make you pay a copay unnecessarily, and take a half day off of work everytime because you have to be there for 4 hours because they have triple booked. This isn't even starting on how rude they are, the PA staff turnover, and incorrect billing practices.

text: Do not go! Worst bed side manner ever!

name: Get Brad
text: This practice used to be a great place to send your family for medical advice/ treatment, but in the last few years, the staff and over all atmosphere have begun to reflect an apathetic demeanor. When you think of a local family medical practice, you think of customer service and a more intimate experience, but you will no longer find it here. After many years of being a loyal patient, many mistakes were made, that at first, could be easily resolved and forgiven, but quickly turned sour as the unknowledgable staff have created a feeling of what can only be described as bureaucratic red tape. The bottom line is that they have lost sight of what a family practice should be.

text:

That's insane. What a ridiculous waste of your patients' time!  If you can't see us till four, schedule is at four!
Original Review:
The best doctor's office I've found in Florence. Definitively better than most and most respectful of different people.

name: Josh Boozer
text: Presented on 5/18 with large boil on lower left cheek.   Requested specifically for it to be lanced because I needed immediate relief.   It drained some throughout the night while sleeping on wet washcloth with heating pad under it.   Nurse Practitioner came in looked at it, felt it, remarked on how big it was yet refused to lance it.   She offered to give me a shot which is good but would not have provided the immediate relief I went there for, so I left.   Went across the street to Doctors Care and Dr. Wilcox incised and drained it and the relief was instant.

name: Donna Bush
text: Service was great. I have an issue with them taking money every month out of my checking account. It said I authorized this. Ive not received a bill and do have issue. Anyone else have this problem? I'm going to stop the payments coming out of my account but everyone read what your signing.

name: Alecia Basile
text:
Called. No one picked up. Called again. They forwarded my call immediately. Called a third time. They answered and hung up on me.
However, once you finally get in, the nurse practitioners are wonderful. I felt like she really listened to my questions and did her best to care for me.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had difficulties trying to reach us by telephone. If you would like to try calling and speaking to the center administrator about this she would be more than happy to try and assist you. Thank you for leaving a review!

name: Justin Maddox
text: The staff here is wonderful and always friendly and helpful with whatever you need.There is never any issues in getting the care needed, they are the best in town.

resp.text: Hi Justin, Thanks for the great review! It is truly touching to know you think so highly of us! We look forward to providing you with more great experiences in the near future. It was a pleasure to serve you.

name: bart johnson
text: The staff were very friendly and attentive.  They saw to my need very quickly. If I am sick or need urgent care again I would not hesitate to come back here.

resp.text: If you ever need anything else from us, please feel free to give us a call or stop by. Have an awesome day!

name: Amanda R
text:
Unreliable rapid Covid-19 test: I received a false positive Covid-19 test result at this clinic (confirmed to be false by two subsequent rapid tests and two PCR tests). The test used (Abbott ID Now) has a near zero false positive rate when a qualified technician runs the test. The AFC clinician I saw also told me that there was no way it was a false positive. However, I was told by a clinician at one of my follow up tests that the only way to get a false positive on the Abbott now protocol is if the sample is contaminated or if samples are mixed up. From this, I concluded that the AFC clinician/technician made a mistake, one that was quite costly for me both financially (I spent $450 in follow up testing) and emotionally (I feared I had exposed my elderly parents). I would recommend using a different clinic for a rapid test.

I was also disappointed in their safety protocols vis-a-vis Covid. The front office staff's mask compliance is very poor (some without masks, others with it below the nose), and they have all patients congregate at the check in. During my visit, I spent about 20 minutes just a foot away from another patient who ultimately tested positive (which I know because I heard them give him the results -- so much for privacy).

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review. We sincerely apologize about the issues you experienced, and we hope to make this right. Please reach out to 256-485-0982 so we can rectify this issue.

name: Patrick Connor
text: Was a good facility the first time I went. This time, I have an infected ingrown toenail and need to see a doctor. Walked in at 10:30 and the front desk lady told everyone that she needed time to register all the people still waiting. She wouldn’t be taking anyone until 1:30pm. I went and got a haircut, and went shopping at Walmart and came back at 1:20 to see what was happening. I went to the front desk while the blond lady with glasses was chatting with someone at the window. After they finished talking I asked if I could see the doctor and was told that she hadn’t even finished the first page and that the time was extended. She wasn’t very sympathetic and a bit rude considering I had been driving around waiting for hours and my toe hurt. I ended up going to an urgent care in rainbow city where they actually cared about there patients.

resp.text: We would like the chance to turn your experience around. If you are willing to give us another chance, please reach out to us at American Family Care - Gadsden (256) 485-0983 to speak to our manager directly.

name: Amy Brown
text:
Worst experience ever!  Went in for a possible broken rib due to a fall and they wrote it up as “back pain”.  My back was not even hurting.
Tried for 3 days to call them back to fix it and they wouldn’t answer the phone.  It rang and rang and then would be busy.
I also was the ONLY CAR there And went straight back to a room after signing in.  (Where I would WAIT ONE HOUR on an X-ray and then another 30 minutes on doc and results?)
Meanwhile I could hear nurses and staff “cutting up” outside my door. This place is terrible and I never ever have given anyone a review like this.
I just feel something needs to be done about the way they treat their patients.  It’s rediculous.

resp.text: We regret to hear that your recent experience was anything less than exceptional.Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will use your comments to refine our efforts to ensure this issue does not happen again.

name: Becky Gay
text:
My husband needed stitches and we went to AmFam in Gadsden. I paid the copay with my credit card. About a month later I got a statement from AmFam showing that they charged the entire amount of the visit to my credit card instead of insurance.
The bottom line here is that they have no incentive to refile to insurance because they already have their money-they just charged my credit card a month later.
The billing department will not answer the phone. The office manager is not available.

name: J V
text: They just want the copay. Been using them for over a year because of convienince. Haven’t been seen by the actual doctor once, always the nurse practitioner. Have ignored my complaints about medication, I can only assume it’s because they get a kickback for pushing certain medications. Requested a week extension on my medication till I could get into the office for a checkup, they wouldn’t do it. I’ve never had these issues with any doctors office before them. I’m currently seeking out a REAL health clinic. I’d stay away from this one if I was you.

text: I took my 9yr old son in 1/24/2020. We were greeted by Richard and Ashley at the front desk very friendly staff and helpful. Thank you,  Richard and Ashley for going the extra mile. The staff in the back was equally nice and caring towards me and my son. Kayla, April, Erica, and Dr Crowe. Thank y’all some much for going the extra mile. We did not feel rushed or just another number to get in and out. The Dr. took time with my son and even struck up a conversation with him about his favorite subject. The staff talked and joked with him also. To a kid that feels bad and has to Endure throat swabs and nose swabs they made it easy and bearable. I would definitely recommend and will definitely go back.

text: Before covid we received great care from this and the Oxford location. however we have been four times in the past month with my husband experiencing dizziness, muscle spasms, headache, extreme fatigue, nausea, ear pain, stomach pain, and diarreah. They can't see past covid enough to notice that the symptoms he has are all side effects and allergic reactions to a medication they prescribed two months ago! My husband has been out of work for three weeks and could lose his job because they didn't even attempt to treat him. We will not be returning to this location or the oxford location.  Also, we have shown signs of having ear infections and literally have to ask for treatment. My daughter presented with a swollen throat and ended up having tonsillitis diagnosed at a different urgent care. The nurse practitioner didn't even feel her neck to check if it was swollen.

name: Controlled Chaos.
text: The receptionist is amazing but my experience has been horrible. I came in on Saturday (6/13/2020) for a DOT physical, after the physical was completed they couldn't get the paperwork to print off. They asked me to come back in on Monday because they couldn't get it fixed until then. I called 1st thing on Monday and they said they where printing it off. Then I arrived around 10:30 and was told they where still working on it, I said I would go into Walmart to pick up a few things I returned at 11:20 and the receptionist said it was almost ready. Then at 12:10 she called me up to the counter and said it would be a little while because all the rooms where full and she said it was on the doctors desk so I don't understand what I'm waiting on!! for her to sign it or what but if it's not ready by 1:00 I'll be demanding a refund and I'll go somewhere else. In the meantime at least two more patients have walked in requesting a covid-19 test because they've been exposed the longer I wait on her to sign a piece of paper the higher my chances of becoming exposed become.

text: I would normally give this location 5 Stars and Dr. Cole is wonderful, but the Dr. Is out on medical leave and they have 2 nurse practitioners that tend to the patients that seem like they don't care if you live or die. I'm not sure if they have all new staff but the few times I have had to deal with them they have been rude and the office manager is never in the office. Right now if you need good care I would go somewhere else. Hopefully when the Dr comes back the normal amazing help and staff will come back with her. I am extremely disappointed with how this office is currently ran because I thought I had found a great Dr and staff.

resp.text: Hi Morg, we regret to hear that you are displeased with your recent experience with us. Here at American Family Care - Gadsden, we are always looking for ways to improve; we appreciate your input. If you would be willing, we would like to have you contact our manager at (256) 485-0982 to discuss ways we can better serve you in the future.

name: Melanie New
text:
I've been past from doctor to doctor and finally met with Dr. Brown by accident in Oxford. I will gladly drive to Gadsden to make sure I get the right treatment.
I've seen her now probably 5 times and treated me with respect and sending me to the correct doctors to get a proper diagnosis.
My words cannot express the sincerity when she looked over my records from me being sick over a yr with no full diagnosis.
Can't thank her enough for not shoving me out the door saying she doesn't know what's wrong with me.
I'd recommend her to anyone.
Was just seen on a Friday evening for upper respiratory issues got a breathing treatment 2 shots and at a reasonable pace. Staff were wonderful. Thank you Dr. Brown and Staff. Yes even the one that administered the shots. Yep OUCH. BUT I do feel some better today.

resp.text: Melanie New, thank you for the high star rating!

name: Gary Eaker
text: Friendly, caring, knowledgeable staff and management!!!! The place to go when sick for fast effective treatment!!!!

name: Carrie Layfield
text: First visit there.  I had been turned away at 4:00 from the place I regularly go and they didn't close until 5:30.  It was frustrating and I went in ready to give a new place a try.  Staff was extremely friendly and competent.  I was seen quickly and have always had a much longer wait at my regular place.  I was also given a prescription discount card which was nice.  I know 4 other patients also came in after me that were turned away from the same place.  If they all had experience as good as mine I'm sure AFC has gotten several new customers.  Thank you!

resp.text: Carrie Layfield, thank you for your kind review; we are happy to pass along your comments to the team here at American Family Care - Gadsden! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Anthony Noah
text: Our toddler spiked an extremely high fever on a Sunday afternoon. Our pediatrician was closing so we decided to go to AFC Gadsden instead of the ER! It was a great decision! Everyone took great care of us, from the reception desk to the treatment room! The lab draw was analyzed on site and showed a bacterial infection. Dr Cole quickly offered us several options for treatment and got our little one feeling better that evening. Our total time in office was barely 45 minutes. The copay for a ER visit would have been 5x the office visit copay!!! Thank you all for taking such good care of our family!!!

resp.text: Anthony, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to American Family Care - Gadsden! If you're ever in need of more help, please let us know!

name: Mizzuz Mo
text: I saw NP Beck and had a lovely short/dark haired nurse who did xrays of my neck. Wish I'd caught her name-- she is hilarious. You just want to hug them both. Liked them instantly. I'm a ball of nerves and they were very kind and patient with me😘. Hannah administered 3 shots with skill! Thank you girl! And this morning Alexa called just to check on me. How sweet?! So I was able to tell her what was working, what is not, how I'm coping, etc. And she said she would pass info to NP Beck. Healing from an injury is a process made more complicated when you have children to care for, and even though I'm still hurting I had to take the time to give them the 5 stars they deserve--L. Mosley❤

resp.text: Hi Blessed One, thank you so much for your positive comments about American Family Care - Gadsden! We are always more than happy to assist you if anything else comes up. Take care!

name: Vivian Downs
text: This is the arc in front of walmart: we walked in on a Sunday and the facility was empty. I felt relieved because I thought maybe they could see me pretty quick.  We go up to the front desk and no one is there. So we wait. And wait. And wait. Finally my boyfriend calls the front office and gets someone to come up. No apology for our having to be there for a while after I explained we had been waiting and never been to an afc  before. I tell the woman I don't have insurance. She goes over how much it will be. I decide maybe I should wait till the morning so I have time to get the money together. She had her lunch in her hand so I didn't feel comfortable bothering her anymore. We step out and I think about it and decide I should be able to manage the payment. We go back in she is gone. We wait a little bit again and then we call the front office. This time she doesn't come up and in fact, no one ever shows back up. It left me feeling like maybe that's how the service there in general was. As someone who has a fear of going to the doctor anyway, this lack of attention spooked me a little.

resp.text: Vivian Downs, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us, but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. Our manager would really like to speak with you more regarding this matter. Please reach out to us at (256) 485-0982. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Hung Tran
text: Doctors and Nurses here are awesome. However, billing department is horrible. I am an active duty service member. Our family is insured with Tricare Prime which covers 100%. My wife goes to this clinic because the location is convenient and the clinicians are great. Two weeks ago we received a letter from American Family Care stating that the amount of $54.66 has been sent to collection. I was shocked. Called the clinic and they give me the number for billing the department. Call the billing department and one of the lady who happened to be super rude picked up the phone after I waited 45 min told me that the amount of $54.66 we owned is the deductible. I tried to explain to her that with Tricare Prime there is no out of pocket cost at all. She told me to call Tricare and ask one of the Tricare representative to give her a call. Called Tricare, the representative from Tricare said that they are a receiving call center only, they don't make call out to other people. Asked Tricare about that $54.66, they explained to me that the billing department from AFC mess up the claim. Instead of filling the claim under my regular PCM, they filed it under another physician who wasn't a primary care physician at that time. That's why Tricare didn't process the entire claim amount. Instead of reprocess the claim, no one from AFC ever go back to take a look at the claim but instead decide to bill me the remaining amount. Tricare advise me to call AFC and make a conference call while everyone is on the line so Tricare rep can walk someone from AFC billing department through how to reprocess the claim to resolve the problem. Called back to AFC billing department and talk to someone name David. I explained the entire process to him again and he said he will make some note and transfer the case over to someone who can resolve the problem and I should expect a call back either later that day or the day after. Guess what, today is 2 weeks later and still haven't heard anything from them. Tried to call the "patient advocate" number from whoever gave the number to Carol Peppers on the comment below and just as I expected "the number you have called can no longer received voice mail".  Wowwww that just blew my mind. Didn't see that coming at all.

resp.text: Hung Tran, we regret that you had a negative experience with us, but are glad you brought this to our attention. Please call our manager directly at (256) 485-0982 for ways we can work towards resolving these issues. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

The ladies at Cahaba Medical are so kind and caring. The last time I went I was getting labs drawn, and being very much not okay with needles and stuff, and also being under a lot of stress situationally, I started crying. Everybody was very concerned and kind to me.

They care about you and remember you as a person. They treat everyone with personal compassion.

Thanks, y'all.

name: Donna Simmons
text: Again I was treated professionally and with respect and kindness I am very pleased with all of the knowledge that  all doctors have diagnosed me . I would highly recommend  CAHABA MEDICAL to everyone . God sent them to BIBB COUNTY GOD THANK YOU AND BLESS ALL OF MANY DIFFERENT DEVOTIONED PERSONS WHO MAKE ALL OF FAMILY OF CAHABA MEDICAL . I LOVE THEM ALL !!! 💓

resp.text:
Hello Donna,

Thank you for choosing Cahaba Medical! We appreciate your kind words.

Have a wonderful day,
Cahaba Medical Care - Centreville

name: Rebecca Godwin
text: Had a good experience, The staff was very friendly and helpful, We didn't have any wait time,

name: Kael Wilfrey
text: The staff are professional and involved,  and they're well-organized. My only complaint would be  how hard it is to get them to communicate with a pharmacy when there are prescription errors.

name: Kristen Smith
text: Love Dr Richardson. He explained meds very well. Very glad I found this practice.

name: Heather Busby
text: Warm caring people.  Definitely recommend

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Heather. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Cahaba Medical Care - Centreville

name: Sheila Beam
text: Service was friendly and fast. Diagnosis was good and felt better within a short period of time.

name: James Cruso
text: Very good Staff and all employees the Doctor's are the best.

name: Maggie Melendez
text: Fast and friendly staff.  Claire Ahalt is a great doctor she genuinely listens and cares.  A lil bit of a drive for me but worth it.  They have a pharmacy ,lab -work, and for everything else a hospital behind them.

name: Latisha Anderson
text: Great customer service in a timely manor. Thanks!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Latisha. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Cahaba Medical Care - Centreville

name: Skylark Russell
text: I was very happy with the way they showed concern about me and my health. I feel like i made a great choice on making cahaba medical my perminate doctor

name: Lylah Purifoy
text:
My family and I will not be returning for care from this facility. The staff is filled with untrained interns that are shadowing and have not been accepted into nursing school. I went to receive two shots for my four year old and get immunization records for pre-k. My child was held down by 6 people and given 4 shots at the same time. The 8th person in the room was a doctor who would not let me hold my 4 year olds hand or calm my 8 year old son with autism down when he was panicking from his brothers screams. My 8 year old was the 9th person in the room. (The very disappointed parent)I was the 10th person in the room. After having this traumatic experience happen to my kids. I sat in the lobby for an extra 20 minutes waiting with my frightened and aggravated children waiting for immunizations record.
I spent 4 hours in this facility and did not receive the care and services my family deserved.

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Nice employees

resp.text:
Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue, Anthony. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that this standard was not met in your interaction with us. In an effort to resolve any issues that you may have had, someone from our office will be reaching out to you.

Thank you!

Cahaba Medical Care - Centreville

name: Robin Boatner
text:
Everyone was kind, showed great concern for my situation! Professional. Meeting my needs!
Thank you,
Robin Miller

name: Dinah Hollingshead
text: Cahaba Medical Care has energetic and professional staff that attempt to make your visit as easy as possible.

name: Kathy Litton
text: Always have a pleasant visit. Everyone is very professional and nice.

name: Janet Mathis
text:
I have been seeing Dr. Yartins for over a year now.  I have had 4 different Doctors since 2015 when I started using Cahaba Medical Center and by far,  Dr. Yartins is the Best Doctor I have had.
She will give you as much time as you need,  she gives 110% in every way possible.  Dr. Yartins has been so great at helping me with my issues,  she worked so very hard to find me the best medication for my sweating and all of my other issues.
I can't say enough wonderful things about her. I look forward to my visits with her.
Thank you Dr. Yartins for being such a awesome person.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Janet. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Cahaba Medical Care - Centreville

name: Sherry Childers
text: We have always gotten great care at Cahaba and this visit was no different.

name: Joe Nevels
text: Dr. Josh Eldrege is really good and listens to his patients. I pray he is always there for his patients.

name: Paul
text: Great, attentive care and wonderful staff. Dr Hyer is exceptional!

name: Brenda Bradford
text: Love love love Dr. Bishop at Cahaba Medical Care!! She was so attentive, and caring! 💕

name: Ranea Hathcock
text: Everyone is so nice and friendly, family like atmosphere

name: Kacey D
text: Love everyone there. But, My doc is Shelley Waits and I absolutely love her to death and we will be moving to Birmingham with her!

name: Sonja Dorough
text: very satisfied with Cahaba Medical Care in Centreville, AL.  They always attend to my needs and the needs of my family.

name: Tommy Ratcliff
text: The staff was kind and helpful and would recommend them to others

name: Terry Duncan
text: There is no privacy and/or confidentiality. If you go here be aware that your medical problems and history will be discussed/known by the whole town.

name: Tracie Tilley
text: Been going here for years and they are always friendly, professional and caring.

name: Toni Smith
text: Love this place, doctors or great. And if you don't like that one doctor you can request another doctor.  They work with you if your on a limited income.

name: Deanna Lawley
text: Should take a little more time when coming into the room to listen to what you're patient has to say,most dr actually sit down and talk with there patients not stand with there arms propped up and looking like your just ready to leave the room as soon as you enter.

name: Ray Cameron
text: Doctors and Staff are friendly and helpful.

name: Sherry Holland
text: They're always awesome and was able to squeeze my son in for an appointment when he was really sick

name: Andrea Hales
text: They always try their best to help me out. If they can't do certain tests they refer you to someone who can. They will exercise everything possible to find the problem

name: Google User
text: My regular Dr is never in so whenever I see another Dr I am always told I need to come back and see my regular Dr.  So yet again today was a waste of time and money. Please go somewhere else so you will get the care you need and deserve.

name: John David Williamson
text: Great doctors, great staff. Wonderful place to get medical care.

name: Emotional developent kids Taken From their mother
text: Had some issues with fax no one could figure out what was going on finally had to call supervisor to find out she was a lot of help thanks susie

name: TyreAsia Gale
text: Very caring health care providers!!

name: Jason Stevens
text: Excellent doctors providing quality health care

name: Geraldine Green
text: Waited over a hour to have blood drawn...NOT happy!

name: Amanda Seward
text: Awesome staff awesome atmosphere..

name: Joseph Cox
text: Quick and helpful - Thanks, Dr. Smith!

name: Google User
text:
This is not a real doctor's office they can only tell you if your sick My wife went and had very high blood pressure they didn't treat her because her doctor wasn't in told her to go home and lay down and rest what a joke of a place Maybe because she had real insurance and not Obamacare go to
Brentwood Animal Hospital you will be treated better

name: William Seward
text: Had a very good office visit

name: Giovani Cano
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service, really professional people. !!!!

(Original)
Excelente servicio,  personas realmente profesionales.!!!!

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Giovani. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

Cahaba Medical Care - Centreville

name: PATRICIA BARR
text: My mother's doctor. So kind and helpful! We appreciate him and the staff.

name: Kent Burns
text: Great bedside manner! Very thorough, and great at informing you of all results and options.

name: Kyle Jernigan
text: Moved my family to his practice and it's the best decision we've made in a long time. He genuinely cares about his patients and our well-being, he takes time to talk to you and discuss any issues - as well as treatments. His office staff are always very helpful and polite, you can tell the culture there is a priority of care for patients. My family absolutely loves him and his practice!

name: Deborah Anderson
text: Absolutely the most caring knowledgeable physician and staff. Dr. Laubenthal is our family physician which includes our daughter with multiple complex medical needs. We greatly appreciate the excellent medical care our family receives.

name: Michael Sandel
text: Dr. Laubenthal is patient, knowledgeable, transparent, and trustworthy. He also carefully selects specialists when making referrals.

name: Jon Howell
text: Terrible waiting time. I waited 3 hours for my appointment, 3 people walked in and said Dr. Laubenthal said to send them back. This happened on 2 appt. Why the preferential treatment? Why make appointments if friends can walk right in? I moved to a great doctor that respects patients time.

name: Heather Miller
text:
I love Dr. Laubenthal because they don't just slap on a diagnosis. They really listen to what the patient has to say and they try to find the source. I like that they don't try to put on a band-aid rather than finding a solution to the underlying issue. I also love that Dr. Laubenthal takes parent's instinct into consideration when treating a child. I have been to pediatricians who literally said, "No that's not the issue." Dr. Laubenthal will say, "I don't think that is it, but you are the mom and God gave you instincts so let's look into it," or "This is why it can't be that" and gives me lab data or proof that I am incorrect in my thoughts.

I genuinely trust him to assess, diagnose, and treat my family and me. Here are a couple of other examples:

Dr. Laubenthal successfully diagnosed me with a condition when for years I was told I had something else and needed surgery. I now experience zero symptoms.

Lacey Quarles successfully diagnosed me with pulmonary emboli when it was thought I had pneumonia. I was hospitalized shortly after and told it was caught "just in time."

name: Casey Jones
text: Usually we have no issues with this place but the last visit really did it for me. The lady in the front office didn’t wanna do her job & had an ugly poor attitude. The heavy set woman doctor we seen acted clueless. It was just an easy money pit. I’m now taking my kids to their regular doctor to get the issue fixed. That was just a quick money stop at their clinic. Ive never had a doctor tell me they didn’t know. If you don’t know, look further into the issue until the patient is fixed!

name: Jaime ford cross
text: First and last time visiting this location. Tried to do online registration from parking lot. Server error tells me to come inside and register. Talk to girl working the desk and explained and she was rude. Gave me the tablet and I register and go back out and wait. I noticed people register after me getting in and out. Check online and she had me register for Brewton.  When I went back inside very rude and told me to register again and wait outside. I would not recommend  this location to anyone.

name: Sara hennings
text: Poor customer experience. Courtney Lambert at the Andalusia clinic is horrible. They should not be advertising that they do Workman's comp.

name: Tina Roberts
text: Being new to the area we do not have family Doctors yet. I tried to take my daughter in to have an abscess looked at. They assure you on the voicemail that once they text you to come in they take you straight back to a room. Front desk said we’d be in quick because we were not COVID. That did NOT happen. I got the text, waited 15 min, surrounded by COVID PATIENTS, I said we were gonna wait outside. She said they are getting ready to take her back. 15 more min of waiting in a corner. After that we left. I called and told them we were canceling and why. They didn’t seem to care when I called. That is not COVID prevention. Why didn’t THEY stay in THEIR cars? I’ve had it and don’t want my daughter to get it at all or I get it again. If we do I blame them.

name: L L
text: we received our first covid vaccination, the process of signing up and scheduling was fine the staff were very nice and courteous and the person that administered our shots was very nice and very professional i highly recommend the andalusia location (where we went) to get vaccinated

name: Crystal Mcneill
text: I sat there from 8:45 to 12 to get "rapid results" 😡 also charges double the other clinic Wich I didn't know until afterwards. The staff was friendly but it was ridiculous.

name: Lynn Fehr
text: Went in today for covid test . I had my response within 15minutes.  They gave me a full exam. Several prescriptions.  This was not just a your positive here's you results Dr. Very caring.

name: Bekah Jenson
text: All the staff was more than helpful and reasonable considering they were at full capacity for covid testing. Patients were able to wait in their cars to ensure they didn’t overheat and the wait was perfectly acceptable for the conditions they worked with. The nurse and doctor/practitioner were kind and moved as quickly as they were able to. Highly recommend this team!

resp.text: Thank you, Bekah!

name: Olivia Mitchell
text: Sat in the hot car for 2 and a half hours waiting to get covid test I got the text to come inside and was informed they reached their "max" on covid test. Could have told me that before I had to sit in the hot car for 2 and a half hours waiting.

name: Brandon Ward
text: I wasn’t too happy about my visit. I came for rapid Covid testing and it took over two hours. I opted to sit in vehicle to receive a text when they were ready. I got my text and came in and was told to sit down and wait as soon as they can help me. It defeated the whole purpose. Instead I was crammed in a room with other possibly sick people. People at the desk weren’t really that friendly and when a customer said they were going to wait outside instead of being sick inside one lady made a smart remark about possibly losing that ladies I.D and Insurance Card.

name: Arnold Clewell
text: The free coffee was nice but after 2+ hours I walked out as the wait was unacceptable. People who arrived 30 minutes after me were seen promptly. I understand that they probably prioritize patients by various means. Regardless its unpleasant to sit in a waiting room with nausea and a sore throat for 2 hours. Save yourself the pain and suffering.

name: Dee Boo
text: I have always enjoyed these people and Ms. Wiggins is amazing! Every time I leave I feel like she has listened to my problems and done the best she can and ALWAYS helped me or sent me to some one who could if she knew she couldn’t. Love this place!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We're so glad we can help you heal and feel better!

name: Kimberly Giles
text: Not friendly ..employee in the reception area are rude not helpful and the staff in the back was Great its like 2 different places

name: BiggSexii Aree
text: I dont recommend To anyone the receptionist is very rude and after speaking with her and telling her what services I came for she was even more rude. This will be my last Trip EVER to this walk in clinic save your time and money because you have to wait hours to be seen for a 20 min appointment.

name: Lisa Gunn
text: Very sweet and caring staff! Love that they have cold waters, juices and even coffee to enjoy while you wait ! Awesome place.

name: sunrise Dino
text: Very nice staff but with a 3 hour wait for covid testing, in a packed room, and no guarantee that they will have tests when it's finally your turn, I had to say no thank you. Why can't they count their tests??? I'll take my chances and NOT wait in a holding pen with a couple of dozen possibly infected people just to find out something they can't help anyway.

name: Tim Nahlik
text: I went on Saturday 1/9/21 morning when they opened for a eye infection there where fifteen cars already waiting so I thought I would do them a favor and request tel health which I did and was approved but never received a call so I followed up on Sunday 1/10/21 and was told I was approved and would be getting a call soon.Well now they have closed and didn’t get any treatment.That’s bad business to offer a service that’s not actually provided that’s why you have such a low rating.

name: Julie Rose
text: Very friendly and helpful. Dr went out of her way to make sure I was taken care of. I never usually have to wait very long. I will keep going back!

resp.text: This is great news! We're so happy to know that you had a good experience. Thank you for sharing!

name: Billy Lee
text: Sunday i waited 7 hours to get some relief for a sinus infection. The Nurse Practitioner said she called me in some stuff to Cvs and then sent me on the way. I go to Cvs they say they didn't get anything. I call the Clinic and they won't answer. I drive to the clinic. Its 2 minutes before closing. The door is locked and the girl at the desk won't come see what i need. Monday morning they won't answer the phone 30 minutes after they open. I go there and tell them CVS has nothing. They look on the computer and say it was sent and to tell CVS to look again and for them to call the clinic if they can't find it. I go to CVS. They don't have it. They call the clinic. The clinic won't answer them. I have to drive back over there. I tell the clinic CVS don't have it and that CVS called and can't get an answer. The girl walks in the back a few minutes. She comes back and says they are taking care of it right now. I return to CVS and wait 45 minutes. Still nothing. I went home (20 minutes away) and waited several more hours. CVS still didn't have anything. 24 hours later from when i first left on Sunday afternoon i went back again to the Clinic and they finally got me something sent to CVS.

name: Serita
text: You must get there around 7am for covid testinf.It is not a drive thru rather everyone has to wait in line outside in the heat for hours to get tested. Forget about social distancing as we are all close together. To have people wait in line in this heat outside while sick is highly irresponsible. I kept thinking one of these people may pass out at any moment.

name: Melissa York
text:
If you are from Fl and have medicade, make sure you say "Florida Medicade"
We waited 7 hours to hear "yes we take medicade but you didn't say Florida"  Seriously, she could have been nicer.

name: J.D. Bonham
text: I was visiting from out of town and needed medical attention. I went to Main Street Family Care in Andalusia, Al.  I was nervous being and did not know what to expect prior to going in. Once I checked in (easy process) and was seen by a Nurse then NP, my comfort level improved. I found the staff to be professional, caring, concerned and willing to help. I never felt the shot the Nurse face me. I recommend this very capable group of caring professionals and I thank you for your help.

resp.text: Thanks so much JD! We appreciate you sharing your experience!

name: Charles Nowling
text: The worst Main Street had to sit for 3 hours just to pee in a cup DO NOT GO TO THIS LOCATION

name: Tracy Willingham
text: MainStreet Family Urgent Care has the most amazing staff! They offer complimentary refreshments, ie. coffee, juice, tea, in the lobby while you wait although most times you are in and out within an hour! I will continue to bring my family to MainStreet Family Urgent Care!!

name: Leah January
text: I specifically said that I was allergic to a certain steroid when they wanted to prescribe that for my sinus infection. I was also asked about the medications I currently take. They logged it all down in their computer in the room. They call in my prescriptions. I wasn't even told what they were calling in. Odd, but ok. So I go pick up my medicine, go home, take it, and within an hour I'm having an allergic reaction to something. I go to the ER. They get me fixed up. They said there are 2 problems here. They prescribed me a STEROID that is 6 TIMES MORE POTENT THAN THE ONE I TOLD THEM I WAS ALLERGIC TO!!! There also is a MAJOR INTERACTION (doctors own words) with one of my daily medicines that I take. The risk is seizures. I feel like they could've killed me!

resp.text:
Hi Leah,

Thank you so much for reaching out! That is certainly concerning, and we definitely want to address this. Our Chief Medical Officer, Dr. Taylor has reached out and left a voicemail and the number we have on file. Please give him a call back as soon as you can so that we can look into this and get more information. Thank you again for bringing this to our attention!

name: Brandon
text:
Went in with a lot of neck and shoulder pain.

After two shots in the butt, I was in a lot more pain.
But after a very uncomfortable car ride home... I'm all better.

10/10. Would feel pain again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing Brandon! We're so happy we could help you feel better! We appreciate you choosing MainStreet Family Care!

name: Leah Blalock
text: I love this place! The free coffee, late hours, toys and color pads for the kids, this place really thought of everything!! Excellent care from an excellent staff!!

name: kenny Spurlin
text: Amazing staff and service they actually take time to find what will work best for you. they just give don't give you anything and rush you out like a lot of other's.  thank you mainstreet you made me feel like family

resp.text: Thank you Kenny! Treating patients like family is exactly what we strive to do! Thank you for choosing MainStreet and for sharing your experience!

name: Jessica Bulger
text: Please do something with your phone system. I have continuously been trying to call for 2 days to pay a bill. The 877 number listed is "not setup to receive calls" and the 427 number (option 2 for bill pay) just rings until it eventually hangs up on you. If you choose option 0 just hoping to find a live body to talk to, it hangs up on you as well. Update: the 427 number has now been busy for the last 10 minutes solid. You'd think with as much as you're charging patients that you'd at least make it convenient for them to pay their bills!!

resp.text: Jessica, we are so sorry for the inconvenience. We are working on the issue with the phones. Please let me know if are still having trouble reaching someone.

name: Joanna Wu
text: Bad service! Race! Attitude! Don’t tell them you wake up at 1 pm they will tell and give you the attitude you are ware !!!

resp.text:
Hi Joanna,

We are very sorry to hear you did not have a good experience. We'd love the opportunity to follow up and improve. When you have a moment, would you please email us at info@mainstreetfamilycare.com with your name, DOB, and any details you can provide about your experience? We certainly want to make this right for you! Thank you again for contacting us.

name: Amara Evans
text: They have one of the best ultrasound techs, Tonya Machen. She really knows her stuff and truly cares for her patients.

resp.text: Thanks Amara! We agree, Tonya is pretty spectacular!

name: Heisenberg Parks
text: I was told to come here to take a urine test that it would only take 10 minutes. It's been an hour and a half and I'm still sitting here. My wife had to be at work 30 minutes ago. 1 hour in I told the lady at the front desk I had to go my wife had to be at work. She said he should be with me shortly. Now were going on 2 hours just to piss in a cup!!!!!!!!!!!

resp.text:
Hi Heisenberg,

We appreciate you reaching out regarding your visit. We always pride ourselves on getting patients in and out within an hour, so we are disappointed to hear your visit took so long! We will certainly follow up with our staff to see what the hold up was and ensure it doesn't happen again. Thank you again for providing us with this feedback!

name: SHANNON “styson76” TYSON
text: Since main street took over it is horrible. You can't get them to answer the phone. They are super slow. Not to mention they don't seem to have  a clue what is going on. I have to fill out new papers every time I go. They no longer see primary care on the weekends and insist you give them a credit card even if you pay cash.

resp.text: We are so sorry for your unsatisfactory experience. We are currently working on our phone systems at this time. Our community educator will be reaching out to speak to you about your visit.

name: Becky Baskerville
text: Waiting room stocked with juice, water, etc..Very kind staff. Dr. Norris was very professional and calming. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you, Becky! We love your feedback!

name: Kelly Wilson
text: Great staff, friendly, and professional. I appreciated their kindness and attentiveness to what I needed.

resp.text: Thank you, Kelly!

name: Jason Jackson
text: Went yesterday and staff was great kind and considerate.

resp.text: Thanks so much Jason! So glad we could help!

name: Vincent Shelley
text: Worst experience ever waited almost 4 hours for an employment drug screen! Rude staff, Clueless and very inconsiderate!

resp.text: We are sorry for your wait time- With the rise of flu, we have experienced longer wait times. Again, we are sorry for your unsatisfactory experience.

name: Gorden Litchfield
text: Was here with my wife for over 2 hours first time,,, then they said her paper work was wrong after waiting for a long time we went and got it right then came back and waited for a long time again for a drug test...cold in the lobby bring a coat...customer service sucks...

name: tami killough
text: Told my daughter they dont accept Ins for a physical to be done. What the hell is the purpose of Ins then?

resp.text:
Hi Tami,

Thank you for your feedback! Insurance usually covers an annual wellness physical, but they typically won’t cover other physicals needed for school or work. What type of physical was she inquiring about? I certainly want to follow up to ensure we’re telling folks correctly on this. Thank you again for reaching out!

name: Emile Hughes
text: Great staff great care

name: Melinda Cole
text: My husband started it seeing Dr. Carroll after he had a heart attack and spoke so highly of him that I decided to change doctors.   I have nothing but wonderful things to say about Dr. Carroll and his staff.  They were efficient and courteous from the moment I walked into the office.  Dr. Carroll and his nurse took time with me, answered questions and explained everything in detail to me.  It was such a pleasant experience, I highly recommend Dr. Carroll to anyone looking for a caring and professional physician.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Our staff strive to provide the best care and experiences. Your recommendation means so much to us.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your comments. Have a great day!

name: Ashley Ford Petty
text: Dr. Carroll is very patient and caring with his patients. He gives a complete exam to make sure he does not miss anything going on with your health. He asks questions and seems genuinely concerned about you. I highly recommend him!

resp.text: Patient satisfaction is our top priority. Thank you for the star rating!

name: Harvey Watts
text: Answer all questions, and ensure any test that l need l get, good doctor and patient relationships. He spends time with his patients and he cares about his patients. He a outstanding Doctor.

resp.text: We strive for 100% satisfaction, and we love to hear about these positive experiences!

name: Emilee Musselwhite
text: I have been seeing Dr. Carroll for a while now. He has shown so much support for my health and how it is affecting my goals/lifestyle. You can tell that he cares for his patients. The staff make you feel welcome and are so helpful. Highly recommend this team!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Your recommendation means so much to us.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your comment. Have a great day!

name: April Quarles
text: Very Quick and Nice process checking in and out. Very nice doctor. Very understanding also.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your rating!

name: Ron Hornbuckle
text: I found Dr. Carroll to be professional, personal, and thorough. It was a pleasure.

resp.text: We strive to provide great experiences. Thank you for your feedback!

name: Dave Quinn
text: This team is excellent. I always feel cared for and not rushed, even on a last minute appointment. Thank you for all that you do to take care of me while working in these trying times.

resp.text: Our staff strive to provide the best care and experiences. Thank you for your comment!

text: Dr. Carroll is skilled, caring health care provider. My husband and I are grateful to be beneficiaries of his practice.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review!

name: Timothy Allen
text: Great appointment,  friendly staff, minimal wait time, patient with their patients! Overall very good experience! Nurse Daniel is very professional and sweet! Love dr Carroll!

resp.text: Our staff strive to provide the best care and experiences. Thank you for your comment!

name: Courtney Szollosy
text: As always, Dr Carroll treated our medical concerns with the perfect amount of aggressive treatment paired with common sense and compassion. He has certainly warned our trust and respect and we are blessed to have him as our family’s doctor.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review!

name: Loretta Enfinger
text: Very knowledgeable, takes time to address your issues and questions. Very courteous, friendly and professional.

resp.text: Thank you; we appreciate your feedback!

name: Jerry Gray
text: My visit with Doctor Carroll was great. He took all the time needed to listen to me and to make me feel like I was important. His nursing staff also made me feel welcome to be there. He is not a pushy doctor that must run in and out in order to see another patient. I haven't seen a doctor like him that is so concerned with a patient's health in many years. He and his staff have my 100% approval.

resp.text: We really appreciate your feedback! Our staff strive to provide the best care and experiences. Thank you for your comments!

name: Kristin Lockridge
text: I really liked Dr Carol. He took time and listened to what all I was concerned about. He made me feel valid. He had great bedside manner.

resp.text: We strive for 100% satisfaction, and we love to hear about these positive experiences! Thank you for your feedback.

name: Tim Greene
text: Very attentive doctor who takes the time to know patients and a staff that is pleasant and friendly. Best of all I trust him.

resp.text: Our staff strive to provide the best care and experiences. Thank you for your comment!

name: Erin Broome
text: Dr. Crocker is an amazing doctor. Very understanding and so ready to help. I’m glad I found this doctor!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review!

name: Melissa Allphin
text: Adam Carroll is the most detailed and concerned doctor I have ever had. I couldn’t be more pleased with the care I was given at Grandview.

resp.text: Our staff strive to provide the best care and experiences. Thank you for your comment!

name: Patrick Lancaster
text: Dr. Carroll is the most personable, down to earth, easy going yet professional doctor I have ever worked with.  A++++ service!

resp.text: We love hearing about these experiences!

name: Jill Lucas
text: Dr. Carroll is by far the best Doctor I’ve been to. The office is very clean, professional and courteous staff, they get you in and out and Carroll is very attentive and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! Our staff strive to provide the best care and experiences. Thank you for your comments!

name: Dan Gordon
text: Dr Carrol is a caring, physician with expertise to match.

resp.text: Thank you; we appreciate your feedback!

name: Audrey Clark
text: He was very easy to talk to and very helpful.

resp.text: We love hearing about these experiences!

name: Martina Norton
text: Dr Carroll really listens and seeks to provide first rate care  for his patients.

resp.text: Thank you; we appreciate your feedback!

name: Maddy G
text: Best doctor ever, I am lucky to have him as my Physician, really knows his stuff.

name: Shag Harris
text: I've been using them for years. The staff is wonderful. The doctor's actually listen to you. Best office I've been to.

name: C Bear
text:
Most of the staff are nice except for the billing department. They want to accuse the patient for giving the wrong information to bill your insurance company. I was basically called a liar from Kay, when I told her I only gave them 1 ( my only primary insurance), not 2 insurances. Also, spoke with Tanya. NO HELP!!!
Kudos, to Sara for giving me helpful information and a phone number they had all this time. All I wanted was all of us to be on the same page. I've been working on this for almost a year.
The lesson here folks, if you know what insurance information you've given any doctor's office and you they screw you on the bill. Most of the staff are nice except for the billing department. They want to accuse the patient for giving the wrong information to bill your insurance company. I was basically called a liar from Kay, when I told her I only gave them 1 ( my only primary insurance), not 2 insurances. Also, spoke with Tanya. NO HELP!!!
Kudos, to Sara for giving me helpful information and a phone number they had all this time. All I wanted was all of us to be on the same page. I've been working on this for almost a year.
The lesson here folks, if you know what insurance information you've given any doctor's office and you they screw you on the bill. DON'T GIVE UP no how it takes you.

name: Pamela Schofield
text: I love this Dr Office, they help my husband when no other dr would help him.The other Dr refused to help.

name: kimberly thompson
text: Best dr I ever been to!!!

name: Angel Of Faith
text: Don't go here they charge you a copay than later on charge you again cuz they put everything under urgent care without telling you! Honestly they don't even deserve one star from me! Worst Dr. I've ever been to!

name: Tim Gee
text: Knowledgeable friendly staff.  Great Healthcare provider.

name: Bill Wolfe
text: Excellent fast care from an extremely professional staff

name: Tina Barnett
text: Not recommended

name: Anabel Celis
text:
(Translated by Google) It is a good clinic

(Original)
Es una buena  clínica

name: Angel Sanders
text: Every time I've gone to this clinic I have to wait up to 2 hours before caled to the back and then it takes another 2 hours to be seen in the room. Ridiculous!! The only thing worth waiting this time is they give e proper medical information and gets us better.

name: Lisa Morris
text: I love the staff and doctor Davidson. I have had to wait a long time before. I feel like he take his time with each patient and he will spend as much.tim as needed..

name: paul lee
text: Dr. Bullard is fantastic. She is very thorough and spends time with you and listens. I could not ask for a better doctor!!

name: Courtney Ross
text: Staff is rude. Phone staff was rude as well. Long wait times.

name: Linda Castleberry
